    "isFuturesEnabled": true  // true or false

}

    POST /sapi/v1/sub-account/futures/enable (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    email STRING YES 子帳戶郵箱備註
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    查詢子帳戶Futures帳戶詳情(適用主帳戶)

    響應

    
{
    "email": "abc@test.com",
    "asset": "USDT",
    "assets":[
        {
            "asset": "USDT",
            "initialMargin": "0.00000000",
            "maintenanceMargin": "0.00000000",
            "marginBalance": "0.88308000",
            "maxWithdrawAmount": "0.88308000",
            "openOrderInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
            "positionInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
            "unrealizedProfit": "0.00000000",
            "walletBalance": "0.88308000"
         }
    ],
    "canDeposit": true,
    "canTrade": true,
    "canWithdraw": true,
    "feeTier": 2,
    "maxWithdrawAmount": "0.88308000",
    "totalInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
    "totalMaintenanceMargin": "0.00000000",
    "totalMarginBalance": "0.88308000",
    "totalOpenOrderInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
    "totalPositionInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
    "totalUnrealizedProfit": "0.00000000",
    "totalWalletBalance": "0.88308000",
    "updateTime": 1576756674610
 }

    GET /sapi/v1/sub-account/futures/account (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    email STRING YES 子帳戶郵箱備註
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    查詢子帳戶Futures帳戶匯總(適用主帳戶)

    響應

    {
    "totalInitialMargin": "9.83137400",
    "totalMaintenanceMargin": "0.41568700",
    "totalMarginBalance": "23.03235621",
    "totalOpenOrderInitialMargin": "9.00000000",
    "totalPositionInitialMargin": "0.83137400",
    "totalUnrealizedProfit": "0.03219710",
    "totalWalletBalance": "22.15879444",
    "asset": "USD",  //USDT和BUSD資產匯總
    "subAccountList":[
        {
            "email": "123@test.com",
            "totalInitialMargin": "9.00000000",
            "totalMaintenanceMargin": "0.00000000",
            "totalMarginBalance": "22.12659734",
            "totalOpenOrderInitialMargin": "9.00000000",
            "totalPositionInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
            "totalUnrealizedProfit": "0.00000000",
            "totalWalletBalance": "22.12659734",
            "asset": "USD"  //USDT和BUSD資產匯總
        },
        {
            "email": "345@test.com",
            "totalInitialMargin": "0.83137400",
            "totalMaintenanceMargin": "0.41568700",
            "totalMarginBalance": "0.90575887",
            "totalOpenOrderInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
            "totalPositionInitialMargin": "0.83137400",
            "totalUnrealizedProfit": "0.03219710",
            "totalWalletBalance": "0.87356177",
            "asset": "USD"
        }
    ]
}

    GET /sapi/v1/sub-account/futures/accountSummary (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    查詢子帳戶合約持倉信息(僅適用主帳戶)

    響應

    [
    {
        "entryPrice": "9975.12000",
        "leverage": "50",              // current initial leverage
        "maxNotional": "1000000",      // notional value limit of current initial leverage
        "liquidationPrice": "7963.54",
        "markPrice": "9973.50770517",
        "positionAmount": "0.010",
        "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
        "unrealizedProfit": "-0.01612295"
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/sub-account/futures/positionRisk (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    email STRING YES 子帳戶郵箱備註
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    子帳戶Futures劃轉(僅適用主帳戶)

    響應

    {
    "txnId":"2966662589"
}

    POST /sapi/v1/sub-account/futures/transfer (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    email STRING YES 子帳戶郵箱備註
    asset STRING YES 劃轉資產,e.g.,USDT
    amount DECIMAL YES 劃轉數量
    type INT YES 1:由子帳戶的現貨帳戶劃轉至其USDT本位合約帳戶;2:由子帳戶的USDT本位合約帳戶劃轉至其現貨帳戶；3:由子帳戶現貨帳戶劃轉至其COIN本位合約帳戶；4:由子帳戶COIN本位合約帳戶劃轉至其現貨帳戶
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    子帳戶Margin劃轉(僅適用主帳戶)

    響應

    {
    "txnId":"2966662589"
}

    POST /sapi/v1/sub-account/margin/transfer (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    email STRING YES 子帳戶郵箱備註
    asset STRING YES 劃轉資產,e.g.,USDT
    amount DECIMAL YES 劃轉數量
    type INT YES 1:由子帳戶的現貨帳戶劃轉至其槓桿帳戶;2:由子帳戶的槓桿帳戶劃轉至其現貨帳戶
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    向共同主帳戶下的子帳戶主動劃轉(僅適用子帳戶)

    響應

    {
    "txnId":"2966662589"
}

    POST /sapi/v1/sub-account/transfer/subToSub (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    toEmail STRING YES 接收者子郵箱地址備註
    asset STRING YES
    amount DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    向主帳戶主動劃轉(僅適用子帳戶)

    響應

    {
    "txnId":"2966662589"
}

    POST /sapi/v1/sub-account/transfer/subToMaster (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES
    amount DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    查詢子帳戶劃轉歷史(僅適用子帳戶)

    響應

    [
  {
    "counterParty":"master",
    "email":"master@test.com",
    "type":1,  // 1 for transfer in , 2 for transfer out
    "asset":"BTC",
    "qty":"1",
    "fromAccountType":"SPOT",
    "toAccountType":"SPOT",
    "status":"SUCCESS",
    "tranId":11798835829,
    "time":1544433325000
  },
  {
    "counterParty": "subAccount",
    "email": "sub2@test.com",
    "type":  1,
    "asset":"ETH",
    "qty":"2",
    "fromAccountType":"SPOT",
    "toAccountType":"SPOT",
    "status":"SUCCESS",
    "tranId":11798829519,
    "time":1544433326000
  }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/sub-account/transfer/subUserHistory (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING NO 如不提供，返回所有asset劃轉記錄
    type INT NO 1:transferin,2:transferout;如不提供，返回transferout方向劃轉記錄
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit INT NO 默認值:500
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 如果startTime和endTime均未發送，默認只返回最近30天數據

    子母帳戶萬能劃轉(適用主帳戶)

    響應

    {
    "tranId":11945860693,
    "clientTranId":"test"
}

    POST /sapi/v1/sub-account/universalTransfer (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    fromEmail STRING NO
    toEmail STRING NO
    fromAccountType STRING YES "SPOT","USDT_FUTURE","COIN_FUTURE"
    toAccountType STRING YES "SPOT","USDT_FUTURE","COIN_FUTURE"
    clientTranId STRING NO 不可重複
    asset STRING YES
    amount DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 需要開啟母帳戶apikey“允許子母帳戶劃轉”權限。
    • 若fromEmail未傳，默認從母帳戶轉出。
    • 若toEmail未傳，默認轉入母帳戶。
    • 該劃轉接口不支持合約帳戶間直接劃轉。

    查詢子母帳戶萬能劃轉歷史(適用主帳戶)

    響應

    {
    "result": [
        {
            "tranId": 92275823339,
            "fromEmail": "abctest@gmail.com",
            "toEmail": "deftest@gmail.com",
            "asset": "BNB",
            "amount": "0.01",
            "createTimeStamp": 1640317374000,
            "fromAccountType": "USDT_FUTURE",
            "toAccountType": "SPOT",
            "status": "SUCCESS",
            "clientTranId": "test"
        }
    ],
    "totalCount": 1
}

    GET /sapi/v1/sub-account/universalTransfer (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    fromEmail STRING NO
    toEmail STRING NO
    clientTranId STRING NO
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    page INT NO 默認1
    limit INT NO 默認500,最大500
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 本查詢接口只可以單邊查詢，fromEmail和toEmail不能同時傳入。
    • 若fromEmail和toEmail都未傳，默認返回fromEmail為母帳戶的劃轉記錄。
    • 只可查詢最近30天的記錄。

    查詢子帳戶Futures帳戶詳情V2(適用主帳戶)

    響應

    USDT Margined Futures：

    
{
    "futureAccountResp": {
    "email": "abc@test.com",
    "assets":[
        {
            "asset": "USDT",
            "initialMargin": "0.00000000",
            "maintenanceMargin": "0.00000000",
            "marginBalance": "0.88308000",
            "maxWithdrawAmount": "0.88308000",
            "openOrderInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
            "positionInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
            "unrealizedProfit": "0.00000000",
            "walletBalance": "0.88308000"
         }
    ],
    "canDeposit": true,
    "canTrade": true,
    "canWithdraw": true,
    "feeTier": 2,
    "maxWithdrawAmount": "0.88308000",
    "totalInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
    "totalMaintenanceMargin": "0.00000000",
    "totalMarginBalance": "0.88308000",
    "totalOpenOrderInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
    "totalPositionInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
    "totalUnrealizedProfit": "0.00000000",
    "totalWalletBalance": "0.88308000",
    "updateTime": 1576756674610
 }

    COIN Margined Futures：

    
{
    "deliveryAccountResp": {
        "email": "abc@test.com",
        "assets":[
            {
                "asset": "BTC",
                "initialMargin": "0.00000000",
                "maintenanceMargin": "0.00000000",
                "marginBalance": "0.88308000",
                "maxWithdrawAmount": "0.88308000",
                "openOrderInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
                "positionInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
                "unrealizedProfit": "0.00000000",
                "walletBalance": "0.88308000"
             }
        ],
        "canDeposit": true,
        "canTrade": true,
        "canWithdraw": true,
        "feeTier": 2,
        "updateTime": 1598959682001
    }
 }

    GET /sapi/v2/sub-account/futures/account (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    email STRING YES 子帳戶郵箱備註
    futuresType INT YES 1:USDT Margined Futures, 2:COIN Margined Futures
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    查詢子帳戶Futures帳戶匯總V2(適用主帳戶)

    響應

    USDT Margined Futures：

    {
  "futureAccountSummaryResp": {
    "totalInitialMargin": "9.83137400",
    "totalMaintenanceMargin": "0.41568700",
    "totalMarginBalance": "23.03235621",
    "totalOpenOrderInitialMargin": "9.00000000",
    "totalPositionInitialMargin": "0.83137400",
    "totalUnrealizedProfit": "0.03219710",
    "totalWalletBalance": "22.15879444",
    "asset": "USD",  //USDT和BUSD資產匯總
    "subAccountList":[
        {
            "email": "123@test.com",
            "totalInitialMargin": "9.00000000",
            "totalMaintenanceMargin": "0.00000000",
            "totalMarginBalance": "22.12659734",
            "totalOpenOrderInitialMargin": "9.00000000",
            "totalPositionInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
            "totalUnrealizedProfit": "0.00000000",
            "totalWalletBalance": "22.12659734",
            "asset": "USD"  //USDT和BUSD資產匯總
        },
        {
            "email": "345@test.com",
            "totalInitialMargin": "0.83137400",
            "totalMaintenanceMargin": "0.41568700",
            "totalMarginBalance": "0.90575887",
            "totalOpenOrderInitialMargin": "0.00000000",
            "totalPositionInitialMargin": "0.83137400",
            "totalUnrealizedProfit": "0.03219710",
            "totalWalletBalance": "0.87356177",
            "asset": "USD"
        }
    ]

    COIN Margined Futures：

  "deliveryAccountSummaryResp": {
    "totalMarginBalanceOfBTC": "25.03221121",
    "totalUnrealizedProfitOfBTC": "0.12233410",
    "totalWalletBalanceOfBTC": "22.15879444",
    "asset": "BTC",
    "subAccountList":[
        {
            "email": "123@test.com",
            "totalMarginBalance": "22.12659734",
            "totalUnrealizedProfit": "0.00000000",
            "totalWalletBalance": "22.12659734",
            "asset": "BTC"
        },

            "totalMarginBalance": "0.90575887",
            "totalUnrealizedProfit": "0.03219710",
            "totalWalletBalance": "0.87356177",
            "asset": "BTC"
        }
    ]
  }

    GET /sapi/v2/sub-account/futures/accountSummary (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    futuresType INT YES 1:USDT Margined Futures, 2:COIN Margined Futures
    page INT NO default:1
    limit INT NO default:10, max:20
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    查詢子帳戶合約持倉信息V2(僅適用主帳戶)

    響應

    USDT Margined Futures：

    {
  "futurePositionRiskVos": [
     {
        "entryPrice": "9975.12000",
        "leverage": "50",              // current initial leverage
        "maxNotional": "1000000",      // notional value limit of current initial leverage
        "liquidationPrice": "7963.54",
        "markPrice": "9973.50770517",
        "positionAmount": "0.010",
        "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
        "unrealizedProfit": "-0.01612295"
     }
   ]
}

    COIN Margined Futures：

    {
  "deliveryPositionRiskVos": [
     {
        "entryPrice": "9975.12000",
        "markPrice": "9973.50770517",
        "leverage": "20",
        "isolated": "false",
        "isolatedWallet": "9973.50770517",
        "isolatedMargin": "0.00000000",
        "isAutoAddMargin": "false",
        "positionSide": "BOTH",
        "positionAmount": "1.230",
        "symbol": "BTCUSD_201225",
        "unrealizedProfit": "-0.01612295"
     }
   ]
}

    GET /sapi/v2/sub-account/futures/positionRisk (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    email STRING YES 子帳戶郵箱備註
    futuresType INT YES 1:USDT Margined Futures, 2:COIN Margined Futures
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    為子帳戶開通槓桿代幣(適用母帳戶)

    響應

    {
    "email":"123@test.com",
    "enableBlvt":true
}

    POST /sapi/v1/sub-account/blvt/enable (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    email STRING YES Sub-account email
    enableBlvt BOOLEAN YES Only true for now
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    為子帳戶APIKey開啟/關閉IP白名單(適用母帳戶)

    響應:

    {
    "ipRestrict": "true",
    "ipList": [
        "0.0.0.0", //0.0.0.0為初始化ip（無額外意義），您需要用`POST/sapi/v1/sub-account/subAccountApi/ipRestriction/ipList`來添加ip白名單列表
    ],
    "updateTime": 1636369557189,
    "apiKey": "k5V49ldtn4tszj6W3hystegdfvmGbqDzjmkCtpTvC0G74WhK7yd4rfCTo4lShf"
}

    POST /sapi/v1/sub-account/subAccountApi/ipRestriction (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(UID): 3000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    email STRING YES Sub-account email
    subAccountApiKey STRING YES
    ipRestrict BOOLEAN YES true or false
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    為子帳戶APIKey添加IP白名單(適用母帳戶)

    響應:

    {
    "ip": "8.34.21.101,5.24.40.1"，
    "updateTime": 1636369557189,
    "apiKey": "k5V49ldtn4tszj6W3hystegdfvmGbqDzjmkCtpTvC0G74WhK7yd4rfCTo4lShf"
}

    POST /sapi/v1/sub-account/subAccountApi/ipRestriction/ipList (HMAC SHA256)

    您需要確保已經使用這個接口POST /sapi/v1/sub-account/subAccountApi/ipRestriction開啟了ip白名單功能，才可添加ip地址

    權重(UID): 3000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    email STRING YES Sub-account email
    subAccountApiKey STRING YES
    ipAddress STRING YES 可批量添加，用逗號分隔。單APIKey最多可添加30個
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    查詢子帳戶APIKeyIP白名單(適用母帳戶)

    響應:

    {
    "ipRestrict": "true",
    "ipList": [
        "69.210.67.14",
        "8.34.21.10"
    ],
    "updateTime": 1636371437000,
    "apiKey": "k5V49ldtn4tszj6W3hystegdfvmGbqDzjmkCtpTvC0G74WhK7yd4rfCTo4lShf"
}

    GET /sapi/v1/sub-account/subAccountApi/ipRestriction (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(UID): 3000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    email STRING YES Sub-account email
    subAccountApiKey STRING YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    刪除子帳戶APIKeyIP白名單(適用母帳戶)

    響應:

    {
    "ipRestrict": "true",
    "ipList": [
        "69.210.67.14",
    ],
    "updateTime": 1636371437000,
    "apiKey": "k5V49ldtn4tszj6W3hystegdfvmGbqDzjmkCtpTvC0G74WhK7yd4rfCTo4lShf"
}

    DELETE /sapi/v1/sub-account/subAccountApi/ipRestriction/ipList (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(UID): 3000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    email STRING YES Sub-account email
    subAccountApiKey STRING YES
    ipAddress STRING YES 可批量刪除，用逗號分隔
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    投資人帳戶為託管子帳戶充值資產(適用投資人母帳戶)

    響應

    {
    "tranId":66157362489
}

    POST /sapi/v1/managed-subaccount/deposit (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    toEmail STRING YES
    asset STRING YES
    amount DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    投資人帳戶查詢託管子帳戶資產(適用投資人母帳戶)

    響應

    [
  {
     "coin": "INJ",                //幣種
     "name": "Injective Protocol", //名稱
     "totalBalance": "0",          //總資產
     "availableBalance": "0",      //可用資產
     "inOrder": "0",               //下單凍結
     "btcValue": "0"               //btc估值
  },
  {
     "coin": "FILDOWN",
     "name": "FILDOWN",
     "totalBalance": "0",
     "availableBalance": "0",
     "inOrder": "0",
     "btcValue": "0"
  }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/managed-subaccount/asset (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    email STRING YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    投資人帳戶為託管子帳戶提幣資產(適用投資人母帳戶)

    響應

    {
    "tranId":66157362489
}

    POST /sapi/v1/managed-subaccount/withdraw (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    fromEmail STRING YES
    asset STRING YES
    amount DECIMAL YES
    transferDate LONG NO 提幣會自動發生在選擇的日期(UTC0)，如果沒有選擇日期，提幣會立即生效
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    行情接口

    測試服務器連通性

    響應

    {}

    GET /api/v3/ping

    測試能否聯通RestAPI。

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    NONE

    數據源:緩存

    獲取服務器時間

    響應

    {
  "serverTime": 1499827319559
}

    GET /api/v3/time

    測試能否聯通RestAPI並獲取服務器時間。

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    NONE

    數據源:緩存

    交易規範信息

    響應

    {
    "timezone": "UTC",
    "serverTime": 1565246363776,
    "rateLimits": [
        {
            //這些在"限制種類(rateLimitType)"下的"枚舉定義"部分中定義
            //所有限制都是可選的
        }
    ],
    "exchangeFilters": [
            //這些是"過濾器"部分中定義的過濾器
            //所有限制都是可選的
    ],
    "symbols": [
        {
            "symbol": "ETHBTC",
            "status": "TRADING",
            "baseAsset": "ETH",
            "baseAssetPrecision": 8,
            "quoteAsset": "BTC",
            "quotePrecision": 8,
            "quoteAssetPrecision": 8,
            "orderTypes": [
                "LIMIT",
                "LIMIT_MAKER",
                "MARKET",
                "STOP_LOSS",
                "STOP_LOSS_LIMIT",
                "TAKE_PROFIT",
                "TAKE_PROFIT_LIMIT"
            ],
            "icebergAllowed": true,
            "ocoAllowed": true,
            "isSpotTradingAllowed": true,
            "isMarginTradingAllowed": true,
            "filters": [
                //這些在"過濾器"部分中定義
                //所有限制都是可選的
            ],
            "permissions": [
              "SPOT",
              "MARGIN"
            ]
        }
    ]
}

    GET /api/v3/exchangeInfo

    獲取交易規則和交易對信息。

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    有三種方法

    用法 舉例
    不需要交易對 curl -X GET "https://api.api.com/api/v3/exchangeInfo"
    單個交易對 curl -X GET "https://api.api.com/api/v3/exchangeInfo?symbol=BNBBTC"
    多個交易對 curl -X GET "https://api.api.com/api/v3/exchangeInfo?symbols=%5B%22BNBBTC%22,%22BTCUSDT%22%5D" or curl -g GET 'https://api.api.com/api/v3/exchangeInfo?symbols=["BTCUSDT","BNBBTC"]'

    數據源:緩存

    深度信息

    響應

    {
  "lastUpdateId": 1027024,
  "bids": [
    [
      "4.00000000",     //價位
      "431.00000000"    //掛單量
    ]
  ],
  "asks": [
    [
      "4.00000200",
      "12.00000000"
    ]
  ]
}

    GET /api/v3/depth

    權重(IP):

    基於限制調整:

    限制 權重:
    5, 10, 20, 50, 100 1
    500 5
    1000 10
    5000 50

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    limit INT NO 默認100;最大5000.可選值:[5,10,20,50,100,500,1000,5000]

    數據源:緩存

    近期成交列表

    響應

    [
  {
    "id": 28457,
    "price": "4.00000100",
    "qty": "12.00000000",
    "time": 1499865549590, //交易成交時間,和websocket中的T一致.
    "isBuyerMaker": true,
    "isBestMatch": true
  }
]

    GET /api/v3/trades

    獲取近期成交

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    limit INT NO 默認500;最大值1000.

    數據源:緩存

    查詢歷史成交(MARKET_DATA)

    響應

    [
  {
    "id": 28457,
    "price": "4.00000100",
    "qty": "12.00000000",
    "quoteQty": "48.000012",
    "time": 1499865549590,
    "isBuyerMaker": true,
    "isBestMatch": true
  }
]

    GET /api/v3/historicalTrades

    獲取歷史成交。

    權重(IP): 5

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    limit INT NO 默認500;最大值1000.
    fromId LONG NO 從哪一條成交id開始返回.缺省返回最近的成交記錄。

    數據源:數據庫

    近期成交(歸集)

    響應

    [
  {
    "a": 26129,         //歸集成交ID
    "p": "0.01633102",  //成交價
    "q": "4.70443515",  //成交量
    "f": 27781,         //被歸集的首個成交ID
    "l": 27781,         //被歸集的末個成交ID
    "T": 1498793709153, //成交時間
    "m": true,          //是否為主動賣出單
    "M": true           //是否為最優撮合單(可忽略，目前總為最優撮合)
  }
]

    GET /api/v3/aggTrades

    歸集交易與逐筆交易的區別在於，同一價格、同一方向、同一時間的trade會被聚合為一條

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    fromId LONG NO 從包含fromId的成交id開始返回結果
    startTime LONG NO 從該時刻之後的成交記錄開始返回結果
    endTime LONG NO 返回該時刻為止的成交記錄
    limit INT NO 默認500;最大1000.
    • 如果發送startTime和endTime，間隔必須小於一小時。
    • 如果沒有發送任何篩選參數(fromId,startTime,endTime)，默認返回最近的成交記錄

    數據源:數據庫

    K線數據

    響應

    [
  [
    1499040000000,      //開盤時間
    "0.01634790",       //開盤價
    "0.80000000",       //最高價
    "0.01575800",       //最低價
    "0.01577100",       //收盤價(當前K線未結束的即為最新價)
    "148976.11427815",  //成交量
    1499644799999,      //收盤時間
    "2434.19055334",    //成交額
    308,                //成交筆數
    "1756.87402397",    //主動買入成交量
    "28.46694368",      //主動買入成交額
    "17928899.62484339" //請忽略該參數
  ]
]

    GET /api/v3/klines

    每根K線代表一個交易對。
    每根K線的開盤時間可視為唯一ID

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    interval ENUM YES 詳見枚舉定義：K線間隔
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit INT NO 默認500;最大1000.
    • 如果未發送startTime和endTime，默認返回最近的交易。

    數據源:數據庫

    當前平均價格

    響應

    {
  "mins": 5,
  "price": "9.35751834"
}

    GET /api/v3/avgPrice

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES

    數據源:緩存

    24hr價格變動情況

    響應

    {
  "symbol": "BNBBTC",
  "priceChange": "-94.99999800",
  "priceChangePercent": "-95.960",
  "weightedAvgPrice": "0.29628482",
  "prevClosePrice": "0.10002000",
  "lastPrice": "4.00000200",
  "lastQty": "200.00000000",
  "bidPrice": "4.00000000",
  "bidQty": "100.00000000",
  "askPrice": "4.00000200",
  "askQty": "100.00000000",
  "openPrice": "99.00000000",
  "highPrice": "100.00000000",
  "lowPrice": "0.10000000",
  "volume": "8913.30000000",
  "quoteVolume": "15.30000000",
  "openTime": 1499783499040,
  "closeTime": 1499869899040,
  "firstId": 28385,   //首筆成交id
  "lastId": 28460,    //末筆成交id
  "count": 76         //成交筆數
}

    OR

    [
  {
    "symbol": "BNBBTC",
    "priceChange": "-94.99999800",
    "priceChangePercent": "-95.960",
    "weightedAvgPrice": "0.29628482",
    "prevClosePrice": "0.10002000",
    "lastPrice": "4.00000200",
    "lastQty": "200.00000000",
    "bidPrice": "4.00000000",
    "bidQty": "100.00000000",
    "askPrice": "4.00000200",
    "askQty": "100.00000000",
    "openPrice": "99.00000000",
    "highPrice": "100.00000000",
    "lowPrice": "0.10000000",
    "volume": "8913.30000000",
    "quoteVolume": "15.30000000",
    "openTime": 1499783499040,
    "closeTime": 1499869899040,
    "firstId": 28385,
    "lastId": 28460,
    "count": 76
  }
]

    GET /api/v3/ticker/24hr

    24小時滾動窗口價格變動數據。請注意，不攜帶symbol參數會返回全部交易對數據，不僅數據龐大，而且權重極高

    權重(IP):

    1單一交易對;
    40交易對參數缺失;

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING NO
    • 請注意，不攜帶symbol參數會返回全部交易對數據

    數據源:緩存

    最新價格

    響應

    {
  "symbol": "LTCBTC",
  "price": "4.00000200"
}

    OR

    [
  {
    "symbol": "LTCBTC",
    "price": "4.00000200"
  },
  {
    "symbol": "ETHBTC",
    "price": "0.07946600"
  }
]

    GET /api/v3/ticker/price

    獲取交易對最新價格

    權重(IP):

    1單一交易對;
    2交易對參數缺失;

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING NO
    • 不發送交易對參數，則會返回所有交易對信息

    數據源:緩存

    當前最優掛單

    響應

    {
  "symbol": "LTCBTC",
  "bidPrice": "4.00000000",
  "bidQty": "431.00000000",
  "askPrice": "4.00000200",
  "askQty": "9.00000000"
}

    OR

    [
  {
    "symbol": "LTCBTC",
    "bidPrice": "4.00000000",
    "bidQty": "431.00000000",
    "askPrice": "4.00000200",
    "askQty": "9.00000000"
  },
  {
    "symbol": "ETHBTC",
    "bidPrice": "0.07946700",
    "bidQty": "9.00000000",
    "askPrice": "100000.00000000",
    "askQty": "1000.00000000"
  }
]

    GET /api/v3/ticker/bookTicker

    返回當前最優的掛單(最高買單，最低賣單)

    權重(IP):

    1單一交易對;
    2交易對參數缺失;

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING NO
    • 不發送交易對參數，則會返回所有交易對信息

    數據源:緩存

    Websocket行情推送

    • 本篇所列出的所有wss接口的baseurl為:ws://127.0.0.1:8083
    • payLoad名稱中所有交易對均為大寫
    • 每個到bityard webscoket的鏈接有效期不超過24小時，請妥善處理斷線重連。
    • 每3分鐘，服務端會發送ping幀，客戶端應當在10分鐘內回复pong幀，否則服務端會主動斷開鏈接。允許客戶端發送不成對的pong幀(即客戶端可以以高於10分鐘每次的頻率發送pong幀保持鏈接)。

    實時訂閱/取消數據流

    • 以下數據可以通過websocket發送以實現訂閱或取消訂閱數據流。示例如下。

    訂閱一個信息流

    響應

      {
    "result": null,
    "id": 1
  }

    • 請求

      {
      "time":"1646795010776"",
      "channel": "spot.depth",
      "event": "SUBSCRIBE"",
      "payLoad":[
      "BTCUSDT",
      "ETHUSDT"
      ] }

    取消訂閱一個信息流

    響應

      {
    "result": null,
    "id": 312
  }
    • 請求

    {
    "time":"1646795010776"",
    "channel": "spot.depth",
    "event": "UNSUBSCRIBE"",
    "payLoad":[
    "BTCUSDT",
    "ETHUSDT"
    ] }

    K線信息

    Payload:

    {
    "e": spot.kline_1m, //事件名稱
    "E": 1646795729284, //這根K發送時間
    "s": "BTCUSDT",  //交易對
    "t": "1646795160000",      //K線開始時間
    "T": 1646795729284,       //K線結束時間
    "i": "1m",       //K線間隔
    "o": "9405.34",  //這根K線期間第一筆成交價
    "c": "39491.52",  //這根K線期間末一筆成交價
    "h": "39491.52",  //這根K線期間最高成交價
    "l": "39405.34",  //這根K線期間最低成交價
    "v": "23.77883",    //這根K線期間成交量
}

    K線stream逐秒推送所請求的K線種類(最新一根K線)的更新。

    event name: spot.kline_間隔參數

    Update Speed: 2000ms

    K線圖間隔參數:

    • 1m
    • 3m
    • 5m
    • 15m
    • 30m
    • 60m
    • 1d

    ticker信息

    Payload:

      {
    "e": "spot.ticker",  //事件類型
    "E": 1646796690500,         //事件時間
    "s": "BTCUSDT",          //交易對
    "P": "4.4760298773",          //24小時價格變化
    "o": "38623.29",          //24小時前開始第一筆成交價格
    "h": "40436.22",          //24小時內最高成交價
    "l": "38001",          //24小時內最低成交價
    "v": "57777.46173",           //成交量
    "q": "2244334554.0126057"               //成交額
  }

    實時推送指定交易ticke信息

    event Name: spot.trade

    Update Speed:實時

    歷史成交

    Payload:

    {
               "e":spot.trade,     //事件名稱
               "E":1646796690500,     //事件時間
               "s":BTCUSDT,     //幣種
               "p":36362.3,     //成交價格
               "q":12.0,     //成交量
               "T":1646796690500,     //成交時間
               "m":1,     //0賣出1買入
}

    實時推送訂閱幣種的交易信息

    event Name: spot.trade

    Update Speed:實時

    有限檔深度

    Payload:

    {
  "e": spot.depth,  //事件名稱
  "E": 1646796690500,  //事件時間
  "s": BTCUSDT,  //幣種
  "v": 1646796690502,  //版本號
  "b": [             // Bids 
    [
      "0.0024",         // Price 
      "10"              // Quantity
    ]
  ],
  "a": [             // Asks 
    [
      "0.0026",         // Price 
      "100"             // Quantity
    ]
  ]


}

    每秒或每100毫秒推送有限檔深度信息。每次推送買賣20檔

    event Names: spot.depth

    Update Speed:1000ms或100ms

    現貨帳戶和交易接口

    測試下單(TRADE)

    響應

    {}

    POST /api/v3/order/test (HMAC SHA256)

    用於測試訂單請求，但不會提交到撮合引擎

    權重: 1

    參數:

    同於POST /api/v3/order

    數據源:緩存

    下單(TRADE)

    Response ACK:

    {
  "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
  "orderId": 28,
  "orderListId": -1, //OCO訂單ID，否則為-1
  "clientOrderId": "6gCrw2kRUAF9CvJDGP16IP",
  "transactTime": 1507725176595
}

    Response RESULT:

    {
  "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
  "orderId": 28,
  "orderListId": -1, //OCO訂單ID，否則為-1
  "clientOrderId": "6gCrw2kRUAF9CvJDGP16IP",
  "transactTime": 1507725176595,
  "price": "0.00000000",
  "origQty": "10.00000000",
  "executedQty": "10.00000000",
  "cummulativeQuoteQty": "10.00000000",
  "status": "FILLED",
  "timeInForce": "GTC",
  "type": "MARKET",
  "side": "SELL"
}

    Response FULL:

    {
  "symbol": "BTCUSDT", //交易對
  "orderId": 28, //系統的訂單ID
  "orderListId": -1, //OCO訂單ID，否則為-1
  "clientOrderId": "6gCrw2kRUAF9CvJDGP16IP", //客戶自己設置的ID
  "transactTime": 1507725176595, //交易的時間戳
  "price": "0.00000000", //訂單價格
  "origQty": "10.00000000", //用戶設置的原始訂單數量
  "executedQty": "10.00000000", //交易的訂單數量
  "cummulativeQuoteQty": "10.00000000", //累計交易的金額
  "status": "FILLED", //訂單狀態
  "timeInForce": "GTC", //訂單的時效方式
  "type": "MARKET", //訂單類型，比如市價單，現價單等
  "side": "SELL", //訂單方向，買還是賣
  "fills": [ //訂單中交易的信息
    {
      "price": "4000.00000000", //交易的價格
      "qty": "1.00000000", //交易的數量
      "commission": "4.00000000", //手續費金額
      "commissionAsset": "USDT", //手續費的幣種
      "tradeId": 56 //交易ID
    },
    {
      "price": "3999.00000000",
      "qty": "5.00000000",
      "commission": "19.99500000",
      "commissionAsset": "USDT",
      "tradeId": 57
    },
    {
      "price": "3998.00000000",
      "qty": "2.00000000",
      "commission": "7.99600000",
      "commissionAsset": "USDT",
      "tradeId": 58
    },
    {
      "price": "3997.00000000",
      "qty": "1.00000000",
      "commission": "3.99700000",
      "commissionAsset": "USDT",
      "tradeId": 59
    },
    {
      "price": "3995.00000000",
      "qty": "1.00000000",
      "commission": "3.99500000",
      "commissionAsset": "USDT",
      "tradeId": 60
    }
  ]
}

    POST /api/v3/order (HMAC SHA256)

    發送下單。

    權重(UID): 1 權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    side ENUM YES 詳見枚舉定義：訂單方向
    type ENUM YES 詳見枚舉定義：訂單類型
    timeInForce ENUM NO 詳見枚舉定義：有效方式
    quantity DECIMAL NO
    quoteOrderQty DECIMAL NO
    price DECIMAL NO
    newClientOrderId STRING NO 客戶自定義的唯一訂單ID。如果未發送，則自動生成
    stopPrice DECIMAL NO 僅STOP_LOSS, STOP_LOSS_LIMIT, TAKE_PROFIT,和TAKE_PROFIT_LIMIT需要此參數。
    icebergQty DECIMAL NO 僅使用LIMIT, STOP_LOSS_LIMIT,和TAKE_PROFIT_LIMIT創建新的iceberg訂單時需要此參數
    newOrderRespType ENUM NO 設置響應JSON。 ACK，RESULT或FULL；"MARKET"和"LIMIT"訂單類型默認為"FULL"，所有其他訂單默認為"ACK"。
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    基於訂單type不同，強制要求某些參數:

    類型 強制要求的參數
    LIMIT timeInForce, quantity, price
    MARKET quantity or quoteOrderQty
    STOP_LOSS quantity, stopPrice
    STOP_LOSS_LIMIT timeInForce, quantity, price, stopPrice
    TAKE_PROFIT quantity, stopPrice
    TAKE_PROFIT_LIMIT timeInForce, quantity, price, stopPrice
    LIMIT_MAKER quantity, price

    其他信息:

    • LIMIT_MAKER是LIMIT訂單，如果它們立即匹配並成為吃單方將被拒絕。
    • 當觸發stopPrice時，STOP_LOSS和TAKE_PROFIT將執行MARKET訂單。
    • 任何LIMIT或LIMIT_MAKER類型的訂單都可以通過發送icebergQty而成為iceberg訂單。
    • 任何帶有icebergQty的訂單都必須將timeInForce設置為GTC。
    • 使用quantity的市價單MARKET明確的是用戶想用市價單買入或賣出的數量。
      • 比如在BTCUSDT上下一個市價單,quantity用戶指明能夠買進或者賣出多少BTC。
    • 使用quoteOrderQty的市價單MARKET明確的是通過買入(或賣出)想要花費(或獲取)的報價資產數量;此時的正確報單數量將會以市場流動性和quoteOrderQty被計算出來
      • 以BTCUSDT為例,quoteOrderQty=100:
        • 下買單的時候,訂單會盡可能的買進價值100USDT的BTC.
        • 下賣單的時候,訂單會盡可能的賣出價值100USDT的BTC.
    • 使用quoteOrderQty的市價單MARKET不會突破LOT_SIZE的限制規則;報單會按給定的quoteOrderQty盡可能接近地被執行。
    • 除非之前的訂單已經成交,不然設置了相同的newClientOrderId訂單會被拒絕。

    MARKET版本和LIMIT版本針對市場價格觸發訂單價格規則：

    • 價格高於市價：止損買入，獲利賣出
    • 價格低於市價：止損賣出，獲利買入

    關於newOrderRespType的三種選擇

    • Response ACK:返回速度最快，不包含成交信息，信息量最少
    • Response RESULT:返回速度居中，返回吃單成交的少量信息
    • Response FULL:返回速度最慢，返回吃單成交的詳細信息

    數據源:撮合引擎

    撤銷訂單(TRADE)

    響應

    {
  "symbol": "LTCBTC",
  "origClientOrderId": "myOrder1",
  "orderId": 4,
  "orderListId": -1, //OCO訂單ID，否則為-1
  "clientOrderId": "cancelMyOrder1",
  "price": "2.00000000",
  "origQty": "1.00000000",
  "executedQty": "0.00000000",
  "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.00000000",
  "status": "CANCELED",
  "timeInForce": "GTC",
  "type": "LIMIT",
  "side": "BUY"
}

    DELETE /api/v3/order (HMAC SHA256)

    取消有效訂單。

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    orderId LONG NO
    origClientOrderId STRING NO
    newClientOrderId STRING NO 用戶自定義的本次撤銷操作的ID(注意不是被撤銷的訂單的自定義ID)。如無指定會自動賦值。
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不得大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    orderId或origClientOrderId必須至少發送一個

    撤銷單一交易對的所有掛單(TRADE)

    Response:

    [
  {
    "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
    "origClientOrderId": "E6APeyTJvkMvLMYMqu1KQ4",
    "orderId": 11,
    "orderListId": -1,
    "clientOrderId": "pXLV6Hz6mprAcVYpVMTGgx",
    "price": "0.089853",
    "origQty": "0.178622",
    "executedQty": "0.000000",
    "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.000000",
    "status": "CANCELED",
    "timeInForce": "GTC",
    "type": "LIMIT",
    "side": "BUY"
  },
  {
    "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
    "origClientOrderId": "A3EF2HCwxgZPFMrfwbgrhv",
    "orderId": 13,
    "orderListId": -1,
    "clientOrderId": "pXLV6Hz6mprAcVYpVMTGgx",
    "price": "0.090430",
    "origQty": "0.178622",
    "executedQty": "0.000000",
    "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.000000",
    "status": "CANCELED",
    "timeInForce": "GTC",
    "type": "LIMIT",
    "side": "BUY"
  },
  {
    "orderListId": 1929,
    "contingencyType": "OCO",
    "listStatusType": "ALL_DONE",

    "listClientOrderId": "2inzWQdDvZLHbbAmAozX2N",
    "transactionTime": 1585230948299,
    "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
    "orders": [
      {
        "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
        "orderId": 20,

      },
      {
        "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
        "orderId": 21,
        "clientOrderId": "461cPg51vQjV3zIMOXNz39"
      }
    ],
    "orderReports": [
      {
        "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
        "origClientOrderId": "CwOOIPHSmYywx6jZX77TdL",
        "orderId": 20,
        "orderListId": 1929,
        "clientOrderId": "pXLV6Hz6mprAcVYpVMTGgx",
        "price": "0.668611",
        "origQty": "0.690354",
        "executedQty": "0.000000",
        "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.000000",

        "icebergQty": "0.017083"
      },
      {

        "orderId": 21,
        "orderListId": 1929,
        "clientOrderId": "pXLV6Hz6mprAcVYpVMTGgx",
        "price": "0.008791",
        "origQty": "0.690354",
        "executedQty": "0.000000",
        "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.000000",
        "status": "CANCELED",
        "timeInForce": "GTC",
        "type": "LIMIT_MAKER",
        "side": "BUY",
        "icebergQty": "0.639962"
      }
    ]
  }
]

    DELETE /api/v3/openOrders

    撤銷單一交易對下所有掛單,包括OCO的掛單。

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    Name Type Mandatory Description
    symbol STRING YES
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    數據源:撮合引擎

    查詢訂單(USER_DATA)

    響應

    {
  "symbol": "LTCBTC", //交易對
  "orderId": 1, //系統的訂單ID
  "orderListId": -1, //OCO訂單的ID，不然就是-1
  "clientOrderId": "myOrder1", //客戶自己設置的ID
  "price": "0.1", //訂單價格
  "origQty": "1.0", //用戶設置的原始訂單數量
  "executedQty": "0.0", //交易的訂單數量
  "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.0", //累計交易的金額
  "status": "NEW", //訂單狀態
  "timeInForce": "GTC", //訂單的時效方式
  "type": "LIMIT", //訂單類型，比如市價單，現價單等
  "side": "BUY", //訂單方向，買還是賣
  "stopPrice": "0.0", //止損價格
  "icebergQty": "0.0", //冰山數量
  "time": 1499827319559, //訂單時間
  "updateTime": 1499827319559, //最後更新時間
  "isWorking": true, //訂單是否出現在orderbook中
  "origQuoteOrderQty": "0.000000" //原始的交易金額
}

    GET /api/v3/order (HMAC SHA256)

    查詢訂單狀態。

    權重(IP): 2

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    orderId LONG NO
    origClientOrderId STRING NO
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不得大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    注意:

    • 至少需要發送orderId與origClientOrderId中的一個
    • 某些訂單中cummulativeQuoteQty{{<0，是由于这些订单是cummulativeQuoteQty功能上线之前的订单。}}

    數據源:數據庫

    當前掛單(USER_DATA)

    響應

    [
  {
    "symbol": "LTCBTC",
    "orderId": 1,
    "orderListId": -1, //OCO訂單ID，否則為-1
    "clientOrderId": "myOrder1",
    "price": "0.1",
    "origQty": "1.0",
    "executedQty": "0.0",
    "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.0",
    "status": "NEW",
    "timeInForce": "GTC",
    "type": "LIMIT",
    "side": "BUY",
    "stopPrice": "0.0",
    "icebergQty": "0.0",
    "time": 1499827319559,
    "updateTime": 1499827319559,
    "isWorking": true,
    "origQuoteOrderQty": "0.000000"
  }
]

    GET /api/v3/openOrders (HMAC SHA256)

    獲取交易對的所有當前掛單，請小心使用不帶交易對參數的調用。

    權重(IP):3單一交易對;
    40交易對參數缺失;

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING NO
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不得大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 不帶symbol參數，會返回所有交易對的掛單

    數據源:數據庫

    查詢所有訂單(USER_DATA)

    響應

    [
  {
    "symbol": "LTCBTC",
    "orderId": 1,
    "orderListId": -1, //OCO訂單ID，否則為-1
    "clientOrderId": "myOrder1",
    "price": "0.1",
    "origQty": "1.0",
    "executedQty": "0.0",
    "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.0",
    "status": "NEW",
    "timeInForce": "GTC",
    "type": "LIMIT",
    "side": "BUY",
    "stopPrice": "0.0",
    "icebergQty": "0.0",
    "time": 1499827319559,
    "updateTime": 1499827319559,
    "isWorking": true,
    "origQuoteOrderQty": "0.000000"
  }
]

    GET /api/v3/allOrders (HMAC SHA256)

    獲取所有帳戶訂單；有效，已取消或已完成。

    權重(IP):10帶有symbol

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    orderId LONG NO
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit INT NO 默認500;最大1000.
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不得大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    注意:

    • 如設置orderId{{,订单量将>=}}orderId。否則將返回最新訂單。
    • 一些歷史訂單cummulativeQuoteQty{{<0,是指数据此时不存在。}}
    • 如果設置startTime和endTime, orderId就不需要設置。

    數據源:數據庫

    OCO下單(TRADE)

    響應

    {
  "orderListId": 0,
  "contingencyType": "OCO",
  "listStatusType": "EXEC_STARTED",
  "listOrderStatus": "EXECUTING",
  "listClientOrderId": "JYVpp3F0f5CAG15DhtrqLp",
  "transactionTime": 1563417480525,
  "symbol": "LTCBTC",
  "orders": [
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "orderId": 2,
      "clientOrderId": "Kk7sqHb9J6mJWTMDVW7Vos"
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "orderId": 3,
      "clientOrderId": "xTXKaGYd4bluPVp78IVRvl"
    }
  ],
  "orderReports": [
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "orderId": 2,
      "orderListId": 0,
      "clientOrderId": "Kk7sqHb9J6mJWTMDVW7Vos",
      "transactTime": 1563417480525,
      "price": "0.000000",
      "origQty": "0.624363",
      "executedQty": "0.000000",
      "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.000000",
      "status": "NEW",
      "timeInForce": "GTC",
      "type": "STOP_LOSS",
      "side": "BUY",
      "stopPrice": "0.960664"
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "orderId": 3,
      "orderListId": 0,
      "clientOrderId": "xTXKaGYd4bluPVp78IVRvl",
      "transactTime": 1563417480525,
      "price": "0.036435",
      "origQty": "0.624363",
      "executedQty": "0.000000",
      "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.000000",
      "status": "NEW",
      "timeInForce": "GTC",
      "type": "LIMIT_MAKER",
      "side": "BUY"
    }
  ]
}

    POST /api/v3/order/oco (HMAC SHA256)

    發送新OCO訂單。

    權重(UID): 2 權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    listClientOrderId STRING NO 整個orderList的唯一ID
    side ENUM YES 詳見枚舉定義：訂單方向
    quantity DECIMAL YES
    limitClientOrderId STRING NO 限價單的唯一ID
    price DECIMAL YES
    limitIcebergQty DECIMAL NO
    stopClientOrderId STRING NO 止損/止損限價單的唯一ID
    stopPrice DECIMAL YES
    stopLimitPrice DECIMAL NO 如果提供，須配合提交stopLimitTimeInForce
    stopIcebergQty DECIMAL NO
    stopLimitTimeInForce ENUM NO 有效值GTC/FOK/IOC
    newOrderRespType ENUM NO 詳見枚舉定義：訂單返回類型
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    其他信息:

    • 價格限制:
      • SELL{{:限价>最新成交价>触发价}}
      • BUY{{:限价<最新成交价<触发价}}
    • 數量限制:
      • 兩個legs必須具有同樣的數量。
      • ICEBERG數量不必相同
    • 下單rate
      • 一個OCO訂單被算成2個普通訂單.

    數據源:撮合引擎

    取消OCO訂單(TRADE)

    Response:

    {
  "orderListId": 0,
  "contingencyType": "OCO",
  "listStatusType": "ALL_DONE",
  "listOrderStatus": "ALL_DONE",
  "listClientOrderId": "C3wyj4WVEktd7u9aVBRXcN",
  "transactionTime": 1574040868128,
  "symbol": "LTCBTC",
  "orders": [
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "orderId": 2,
      "clientOrderId": "pO9ufTiFGg3nw2fOdgeOXa"
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "orderId": 3,
      "clientOrderId": "TXOvglzXuaubXAaENpaRCB"
    }
  ],
  "orderReports": [
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "origClientOrderId": "pO9ufTiFGg3nw2fOdgeOXa",
      "orderId": 2,
      "orderListId": 0,
      "clientOrderId": "unfWT8ig8i0uj6lPuYLez6",
      "price": "1.00000000",
      "origQty": "10.00000000",
      "executedQty": "0.00000000",
      "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.00000000",
      "status": "CANCELED",
      "timeInForce": "GTC",
      "type": "STOP_LOSS_LIMIT",
      "side": "SELL",
      "stopPrice": "1.00000000"
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "origClientOrderId": "TXOvglzXuaubXAaENpaRCB",
      "orderId": 3,
      "orderListId": 0,
      "clientOrderId": "unfWT8ig8i0uj6lPuYLez6",
      "price": "3.00000000",
      "origQty": "10.00000000",
      "executedQty": "0.00000000",
      "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.00000000",
      "status": "CANCELED",
      "timeInForce": "GTC",
      "type": "LIMIT_MAKER",
      "side": "SELL"
    }
  ]
}

    DELETE /api/v3/orderList (HMAC SHA256)

    取消整個訂單列表。

    權重(IP): 1

    參數

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    orderListId LONG NO orderListId或listClientOrderId必須被提供
    listClientOrderId STRING NO orderListId或listClientOrderId必須被提供
    newClientOrderId STRING NO 用戶自定義的本次撤銷操作的ID(注意不是被撤銷的訂單的自定義ID)。如無指定會自動賦值。
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    其他注意點:

    • 取消單個leg將取消整個OCO訂單。

    數據源:撮合引擎

    查詢OCO(USER_DATA)

    響應

    {
    "orderListId": 27,
    "contingencyType": "OCO",
    "listStatusType": "EXEC_STARTED",
    "listOrderStatus": "EXECUTING",
    "listClientOrderId": "h2USkA5YQpaXHPIrkd96xE",
    "transactionTime": 1565245656253,
    "symbol": "LTCBTC",
    "orders": [
        {
            "symbol": "LTCBTC",
            "orderId": 4,
            "clientOrderId": "qD1gy3kc3Gx0rihm9Y3xwS"
        },
        {
            "symbol": "LTCBTC",
            "orderId": 5,
            "clientOrderId": "ARzZ9I00CPM8i3NhmU9Ega"
        }
    ]
}

    GET /api/v3/orderList (HMAC SHA256)

    根據提供的可選參數檢索特定的OCO。

    權重(IP): 2

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    orderListId LONG NO orderListId或origClientOrderId必須提供一個。
    origClientOrderId STRING NO orderListId或origClientOrderId必須提供一個。
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不得大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    數據源:數據庫

    查詢所有OCO(USER_DATA)

    響應

    [
  {
    "orderListId": 29,
    "contingencyType": "OCO",
    "listStatusType": "EXEC_STARTED",
    "listOrderStatus": "EXECUTING",
    "listClientOrderId": "amEEAXryFzFwYF1FeRpUoZ",
    "transactionTime": 1565245913483,
    "symbol": "LTCBTC",
    "orders": [
      {
        "symbol": "LTCBTC",
        "orderId": 4,
        "clientOrderId": "oD7aesZqjEGlZrbtRpy5zB"
      },
      {
        "symbol": "LTCBTC",
        "orderId": 5,
        "clientOrderId": "Jr1h6xirOxgeJOUuYQS7V3"
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    "orderListId": 28,
    "contingencyType": "OCO",
    "listStatusType": "EXEC_STARTED",
    "listOrderStatus": "EXECUTING",
    "listClientOrderId": "hG7hFNxJV6cZy3Ze4AUT4d",
    "transactionTime": 1565245913407,
    "symbol": "LTCBTC",
    "orders": [
      {
        "symbol": "LTCBTC",
        "orderId": 2,
        "clientOrderId": "j6lFOfbmFMRjTYA7rRJ0LP"
      },
      {
        "symbol": "LTCBTC",
        "orderId": 3,
        "clientOrderId": "z0KCjOdditiLS5ekAFtK81"
      }
    ]
  }
]

    GET /api/v3/allOrderList (HMAC SHA256)

    根據提供的可選參數檢索所有的OCO。

    權重(IP): 10

    參數

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    fromId LONG NO 提供該項後,startTime和endTime都不可提供
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit INT NO 默認值:500;最大值:1000
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能超過60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    數據源:數據庫

    查詢OCO掛單(USER_DATA)

    響應

    [
  {
    "orderListId": 31,
    "contingencyType": "OCO",
    "listStatusType": "EXEC_STARTED",
    "listOrderStatus": "EXECUTING",
    "listClientOrderId": "wuB13fmulKj3YjdqWEcsnp",
    "transactionTime": 1565246080644,
    "symbol": "LTCBTC",
    "orders": [
      {
        "symbol": "LTCBTC",
        "orderId": 4,
        "clientOrderId": "r3EH2N76dHfLoSZWIUw1bT"
      },
      {
        "symbol": "LTCBTC",
        "orderId": 5,
        "clientOrderId": "Cv1SnyPD3qhqpbjpYEHbd2"
      }
    ]
  }
]

    GET /api/v3/openOrderList (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 3

    參數

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    數據源:數據庫

    帳戶信息(USER_DATA)

    響應

    {
  "makerCommission": 15,
  "takerCommission": 15,
  "buyerCommission": 0,
  "sellerCommission": 0,
  "canTrade": true,
  "canWithdraw": true,
  "canDeposit": true,
  "updateTime": 123456789,
  "accountType": "SPOT",
  "balances": [
    {
      "asset": "BTC",
      "free": "4723846.89208129",
      "locked": "0.00000000"
    },
    {
      "asset": "LTC",
      "free": "4763368.68006011",
      "locked": "0.00000000"
    }
  ],
  "permissions": [
    "SPOT"
  ]
}

    GET /api/v3/account (HMAC SHA256)

    獲取當前帳戶信息。

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    數據源:{{缓存=>数据库}}

    帳戶成交歷史(USER_DATA)

    響應

    [
  {
    "symbol": "BNBBTC", //交易對
    "id": 28457, // trade ID
    "orderId": 100234, //訂單ID
    "orderListId": -1, //OCO訂單的ID，不然就是-1
    "price": "4.00000100", //成交價格
    "qty": "12.00000000", //成交量
    "quoteQty": "48.000012", //成交金額
    "commission": "10.10000000", //交易費金額
    "commissionAsset": "BNB", //交易費資產類型
    "time": 1499865549590, //交易時間
    "isBuyer": true, //是否是買家
    "isMaker": false, //是否是掛單方
    "isBestMatch": true
  }
]

    GET /api/v3/myTrades (HMAC SHA256)

    獲取帳戶指定交易對的成交歷史

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    orderId LONG NO 必須要和參數symbol一起使用.
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    fromId LONG NO 起始Tradeid。默認獲取最新交易。
    limit INT NO 默認500;最大1000.
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能超過60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    注意:

    • 如果設定fromId{{,获取订单>=}}fromId.否則返回最近訂單。

    數據源:數據庫

    查詢目前下單數(TRADE)

    響應

    [
  {
    "rateLimitType": "ORDERS",
    "interval": "SECOND",
    "intervalNum": 10,
    "limit": 10000,
    "count": 0
  },
  {
    "rateLimitType": "ORDERS",
    "interval": "DAY",
    "intervalNum": 1,
    "limit": 20000,
    "count": 0
  }
]

    GET /api/v3/rateLimit/order

    獲取用戶在當前時間區間內的下單總數。

    權重(IP): 20

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不得大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    數據源:緩存

    槓桿帳戶和交易接口

    全倉槓桿帳戶劃轉(MARGIN)

    響應

    {
    //transaction id
    "tranId": 100000001
}

    POST /sapi/v1/margin/transfer (HMAC SHA256) 執行現貨帳戶與全倉槓桿帳戶之間的劃轉

    權重(IP): 600

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES 被劃轉的資產,比如,BTC
    amount DECIMAL YES 劃轉數量
    type INT YES 1:主帳戶向全倉槓桿帳戶劃轉2:全倉槓桿帳戶向主帳戶劃轉
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    槓桿帳戶借貸(MARGIN)

    響應

    {
    //transaction id
    "tranId": 100000001
}

    POST /sapi/v1/margin/loan (HMAC SHA256) 申請借貸。

    權重(UID): 3000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES
    isIsolated STRING NO 是否逐倉槓桿，"TRUE","FALSE",默認"FALSE"
    symbol STRING NO 逐倉交易對，配合逐倉使用
    amount DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能超過60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 如果isIsolated=“TRUE”,表示逐倉借貸，此時symbol必填
    • 如果isIsolated=“FALSE”表示全倉借貸

    槓桿帳戶歸還借貸(MARGIN)

    響應

    {
    //transaction id
    "tranId": 100000001
}

    POST /sapi/v1/margin/repay (HMAC SHA256) 獲取槓桿帳戶歸還借貸。

    權重(UID): 3000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES
    isIsolated STRING NO 是否逐倉槓桿，"TRUE","FALSE",默認"FALSE"
    symbol STRING NO 逐倉交易對，配合逐倉使用
    amount DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能超過60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 如果isIsolated=“TRUE”,表示逐倉還款，此時symbol必填
    • 如果isIsolated=“FALSE”表示全倉還款

    查詢槓桿資產(MARKET_DATA)

    響應

    {
    "assetFullName": "api Coin",
    "assetName": "BNB",
    "isBorrowable": false,
    "isMortgageable": true,
    "userMinBorrow": "0.00000000",
    "userMinRepay": "0.00000000"
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/asset

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES

    查詢全倉槓桿交易對(MARKET_DATA)

    響應

    {
   "id":323355778339572400,
   "symbol":"BTCUSDT",
   "base":"BTC",
   "quote":"USDT",
   "isMarginTrade":true,
   "isBuyAllowed":true,
   "isSellAllowed":true
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/pair

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES

    獲取所有槓桿資產信息(MARKET_DATA)

    響應

      [
      {
          "assetFullName": "USD coin",
          "assetName": "USDC",
          "isBorrowable": true,
          "isMortgageable": true,
          "userMinBorrow": "0.00000000",
          "userMinRepay": "0.00000000"
      },
      {
          "assetFullName": "BNB-coin",
          "assetName": "BNB",
          "isBorrowable": true,
          "isMortgageable": true,
          "userMinBorrow": "1.00000000",
          "userMinRepay": "0.00000000"
      },
      {
          "assetFullName": "Tether",
          "assetName": "USDT",
          "isBorrowable": true,
          "isMortgageable": true,
          "userMinBorrow": "1.00000000",
          "userMinRepay": "0.00000000"
      },
      {
          "assetFullName": "etherum",
          "assetName": "ETH",
          "isBorrowable": true,
          "isMortgageable": true,
          "userMinBorrow": "0.00000000",
          "userMinRepay": "0.00000000"
      },
      {
          "assetFullName": "Bitcoin",
          "assetName": "BTC",
          "isBorrowable": true,
          "isMortgageable": true,
          "userMinBorrow": "0.00000000",
          "userMinRepay": "0.00000000"
      }
  ]

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/allAssets

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:
    None

    獲取所有全倉槓桿交易對(MARKET_DATA)

    響應

    [
    {
        "base": "BNB",
        "id": 351637150141315861,
        "isBuyAllowed": true,
        "isMarginTrade": true,
        "isSellAllowed": true,
        "quote": "BTC",
        "symbol": "BNBBTC"
    },
    {
        "base": "TRX",
        "id": 351637923235429141,
        "isBuyAllowed": true,
        "isMarginTrade": true,
        "isSellAllowed": true,
        "quote": "BTC",
        "symbol": "TRXBTC"
    },
    {
        "base": "XRP",
        "id": 351638112213990165,
        "isBuyAllowed": true,
        "isMarginTrade": true,
        "isSellAllowed": true,
        "quote": "BTC",
        "symbol": "XRPBTC"
    },
    {

        "isBuyAllowed": true,
        "isMarginTrade": true,
        "isSellAllowed": true,
        "quote": "BTC",
        "symbol": "ETHBTC"
    },

        "isMarginTrade": true,
        "isSellAllowed": true,
        "quote": "USDT",
        "symbol": "BNBUSDT"
  }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/allPairs

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    None

    查詢槓桿價格指數(MARKET_DATA)

    響應

    {
   "calcTime": 1562046418000,
   "price": "0.00333930",
   "symbol": "BNBBTC"
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/priceIndex

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES

    槓桿帳戶下單(TRADE)

    Response ACK:

    {
  "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
  "orderId": 28,
  "clientOrderId": "6gCrw2kRUAF9CvJDGP16IP",
  "isIsolated": true,       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
  "transactTime": 1507725176595
}

    Response RESULT:

    {
  "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
  "orderId": 28,
  "clientOrderId": "6gCrw2kRUAF9CvJDGP16IP",
  "transactTime": 1507725176595,
  "price": "1.00000000",
  "origQty": "10.00000000",
  "executedQty": "10.00000000",
  "cummulativeQuoteQty": "10.00000000",
  "status": "FILLED",
  "timeInForce": "GTC",
  "type": "MARKET",
  "isIsolated": true,       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
  "side": "SELL"
}

    Response FULL:

    {
  "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
  "orderId": 28,
  "clientOrderId": "6gCrw2kRUAF9CvJDGP16IP",
  "transactTime": 1507725176595,
  "price": "0.00000000",
  "origQty": "10.00000000",
  "executedQty": "10.00000000",
  "cummulativeQuoteQty": "10.00000000",
  "status": "FILLED",
  "timeInForce": "GTC",
  "type": "MARKET",
  "side": "SELL",
  "marginBuyBorrowAmount": 5,       //下單後沒有發生借款則不返回該字段
  "marginBuyBorrowAsset": "BTC",    //下單後沒有發生借款則不返回該字段
  "isIsolated": true,       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
  "fills": [
    {
      "price": "4000.00000000",
      "qty": "1.00000000",
      "commission": "4.00000000",
      "commissionAsset": "USDT"
    },
    {
      "price": "3999.00000000",
      "qty": "5.00000000",
      "commission": "19.99500000",
      "commissionAsset": "USDT"
    },
    {
      "price": "3998.00000000",
      "qty": "2.00000000",
      "commission": "7.99600000",
      "commissionAsset": "USDT"
    },
    {
      "price": "3997.00000000",
      "qty": "1.00000000",
      "commission": "3.99700000",
      "commissionAsset": "USDT"
    },
    {
      "price": "3995.00000000",
      "qty": "1.00000000",
      "commission": "3.99500000",
      "commissionAsset": "USDT"
    }
  ]
}

    POST /sapi/v1/margin/order (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(UID): 6

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    isIsolated STRING NO 是否逐倉槓桿，"TRUE","FALSE",默認"FALSE"
    side ENUM YES BUY
    SELL
    type ENUM YES 詳見枚舉定義：訂單類型
    quantity DECIMAL NO
    quoteOrderQty DECIMAL NO
    price DECIMAL NO
    stopPrice DECIMAL NO 與STOP_LOSS, STOP_LOSS_LIMIT, TAKE_PROFIT,和TAKE_PROFIT_LIMIT訂單一起使用.
    newClientOrderId STRING NO 客戶自定義的唯一訂單ID。若未發送自動生成。
    icebergQty DECIMAL NO 與LIMIT, STOP_LOSS_LIMIT,和TAKE_PROFIT_LIMIT一起使用創建iceberg訂單.
    newOrderRespType ENUM NO 設置響應:JSON.ACK,RESULT,或FULL;MARKET和LIMIT訂單類型默認為FULL,所有其他訂單默認為ACK.
    sideEffectType ENUM NO NO_SIDE_EFFECT,MARGIN_BUY,AUTO_REPAY;默認為NO_SIDE_EFFECT.
    timeInForce ENUM NO GTC,IOC,FOK
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    槓桿帳戶撤銷訂單(TRADE)

    響應

    {
  "symbol": "LTCBTC",
  "orderId": 28,
  "origClientOrderId": "myOrder1",
  "clientOrderId": "cancelMyOrder1",
  "price": "1.00000000",
  "origQty": "10.00000000",
  "executedQty": "8.00000000",
  "cummulativeQuoteQty": "8.00000000",
  "status": "CANCELED",
  "timeInForce": "GTC",
  "type": "LIMIT",
  "side": "SELL",
  "isIsolated": true       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
}

    DELETE /sapi/v1/margin/order (HMAC SHA256)

    槓桿帳戶撤銷有效訂單。

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    isIsolated STRING NO 是否逐倉槓桿，"TRUE","FALSE",默認"FALSE"
    orderId LONG NO
    origClientOrderId STRING NO
    newClientOrderId STRING NO 用於唯一識別此撤銷訂單，默認自動生成。
    recvWindow LONG NO T賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 必須發送orderId或origClientOrderId其中一個。

    槓桿帳戶撤銷單一交易對的所有掛單(TRADE)

    響應:

    [
  {
    "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
    "isIsolated": true,       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
    "origClientOrderId": "E6APeyTJvkMvLMYMqu1KQ4",
    "orderId": 11,
    "orderListId": -1,
    "clientOrderId": "pXLV6Hz6mprAcVYpVMTGgx",
    "price": "0.089853",
    "origQty": "0.178622",
    "executedQty": "0.000000",
    "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.000000",
    "status": "CANCELED",
    "timeInForce": "GTC",
    "type": "LIMIT",
    "side": "BUY"
  },
  {
    "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
    "isIsolated": false,       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
    "origClientOrderId": "A3EF2HCwxgZPFMrfwbgrhv",
    "orderId": 13,
    "orderListId": -1,
    "clientOrderId": "pXLV6Hz6mprAcVYpVMTGgx",
    "price": "0.090430",
    "origQty": "0.178622",
    "executedQty": "0.000000",
    "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.000000",
    "status": "CANCELED",
    "timeInForce": "GTC",
    "type": "LIMIT",
    "side": "BUY"
  },
  {
    "orderListId": 1929,
    "contingencyType": "OCO",
    "listStatusType": "ALL_DONE",
    "listOrderStatus": "ALL_DONE",
    "listClientOrderId": "2inzWQdDvZLHbbAmAozX2N",
    "transactionTime": 1585230948299,
    "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
    "isIsolated": true,       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
    "orders": [
      {
        "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
        "orderId": 20,
        "clientOrderId": "CwOOIPHSmYywx6jZX77TdL"
      },
      {
        "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
        "orderId": 21,
        "clientOrderId": "461cPg51vQjV3zIMOXNz39"
      }
    ],
    "orderReports": [
      {
        "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
        "origClientOrderId": "CwOOIPHSmYywx6jZX77TdL",
        "orderId": 20,
        "orderListId": 1929,
        "clientOrderId": "pXLV6Hz6mprAcVYpVMTGgx",
        "price": "0.668611",
        "origQty": "0.690354",
        "executedQty": "0.000000",
        "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.000000",
        "status": "CANCELED",
        "timeInForce": "GTC",
        "type": "STOP_LOSS_LIMIT",
        "side": "BUY",
        "stopPrice": "0.378131",
        "icebergQty": "0.017083"
      },
      {
        "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
        "origClientOrderId": "461cPg51vQjV3zIMOXNz39",
        "orderId": 21,
        "orderListId": 1929,
        "clientOrderId": "pXLV6Hz6mprAcVYpVMTGgx",
        "price": "0.008791",
        "origQty": "0.690354",
        "executedQty": "0.000000",
        "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.000000",
        "status": "CANCELED",
        "timeInForce": "GTC",
        "type": "LIMIT_MAKER",
        "side": "BUY",
        "icebergQty": "0.639962"
      }
    ]
  }
]

    DELETE /sapi/v1/margin/openOrders (HMAC SHA256)

    槓桿帳戶撤銷單一交易對下所有掛單,包括OCO的掛單。

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    isIsolated STRING NO 是否逐倉槓桿，"TRUE","FALSE",默認"FALSE"
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    獲取全倉槓桿劃轉歷史(USER_DATA)

    響應

    {
  "rows": [
    {
      "amount": "0.10000000",
      "asset": "BNB",
      "status": "CONFIRMED",
      "timestamp": 1566898617,
      "txId": 5240372201,
      "type": "ROLL_IN"
    },
    {
      "amount": "5.00000000",
      "asset": "USDT",
      "status": "CONFIRMED",
      "timestamp": 1566888436,
      "txId": 5239810406,
      "type": "ROLL_OUT"
    },
    {
      "amount": "1.00000000",
      "asset": "EOS",
      "status": "CONFIRMED",
      "timestamp": 1566888403,
      "txId": 5239808703,
      "type": "ROLL_IN"
    }
  ],
  "total": 3
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/transfer (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING NO
    type STRING NO 劃轉類型:ROLL_IN,ROLL_OUT
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    current LONG NO 當前查詢頁。從1開始。默認:1
    size LONG NO 默認:10最大:100
    archived STRING NO 默認:false.查詢6個月以前的數據，需要設為true
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 響應返回為降序排列。
    • 默認查詢最近7天的數據。
    • 如果想查詢6個月以前數據，設置archived為true。

    查詢借貸記錄(USER_DATA)

    響應

    {
  "rows": [
    {
        "isolatedSymbol": "BNBUSDT", //逐倉借貸返回逐倉symbol;若是全倉不會返回此字段
        "txId": 12807067523,
        "asset": "BNB",
        "principal": "0.84624403",
        "timestamp": 1555056425000,
        "status": "CONFIRMED"   //狀態:PENDING(等待執行),CONFIRMED(成功借貸),FAILED(執行失敗);
    }
  ],
  "total": 1
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/loan (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES
    isolatedSymbol STRING NO 逐倉symbol
    txId LONG NO tranId in POST /sapi/v1/margin/loan
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    current LONG NO 當前查詢頁。開始值1。默認:1
    size LONG NO 默認:10最大:100
    archived STRING NO 默認:false.查詢6個月以前的數據，需要設為true
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 必須發送txId或startTime，txId優先。
    • 響應返回為降序排列。
    • 如果發送isolatedSymbol，返回指定逐倉symbol指定asset的借貸記錄。
    • 如果想查詢6個月以前數據，設置archived為true。

    查詢還貸記錄(USER_DATA)

    響應

    {
     "rows": [
         {
                "isolatedSymbol": "BNBUSDT",     //逐倉還款返回逐倉symbol;若是全倉不會返回此字段
                "amount": "14.00000000",   //還款總額
                "asset": "BNB",
                "interest": "0.01866667",    //支付的利息
                "principal": "13.98133333",   //支付的本金
                "status": "CONFIRMED",   //狀態:PENDING(等待執行),CONFIRMED(成功還款),FAILED(執行失敗);
                "timestamp": 1563438204000,
                "txId": 2970933056
         }
     ],
     "total": 1
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/repay (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP) 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES
    isolatedSymbol STRING NO 逐倉symbol
    txId LONG NO 返回/sapi/v1/margin/repay
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    current LONG NO 當前查詢頁。開始值1.默認:1
    size LONG NO 默認:10最大:100
    archived STRING NO 默認:false.查詢6個月以前的數據，需要設為true
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 必須發送txId或startTime，txId優先。
    • 響應返回為降序排列。
    • 如果發送isolatedSymbol，返回指定逐倉symbol指定asset的還貸記錄。
    • 如果想查詢6個月以前數據，設置archived為true。

    獲取利息歷史(USER_DATA)

    響應

    {
    "rows":[
        {
            "isolatedSymbol": "BNBUSDT", /返回逐倉symbol;若是全倉不會返回此字段            "asset": "BNB",
            "interest": "0.02414667",
            "interestAccuredTime": 1566813600000,
            "interestRate": "0.01600000",
            "principal": "36.22000000",
            "type": "ON_BORROW"
        }
    ],
    "total": 1
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/interestHistory (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING NO
    isolatedSymbol STRING NO 逐倉symbol
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    current LONG NO 當前查詢頁。開始值1.默認:1
    size LONG NO 默認:10最大:100
    archived STRING NO 默認:false.查詢6個月以前的數據，需要設為true
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 響應返回為降序排列。
    • 如果發送isolatedSymbol，返回指定逐倉symbol的記錄。
    • 如果想查詢6個月以前數據，設置archived為true。
    • 返回的type數據有4種類型:
      • PERIODIC每小時收的利息
      • ON_BORROW借款的時候第一次收的利息
      • PERIODIC_CONVERTED每小時收的利息，用BNB抵扣
      • ON_BORROW_CONVERTED借款的時候第一次收的利息，用BNB抵扣

    獲取帳戶強制平倉記錄(USER_DATA)

    響應

      {
      "rows": [
          {
              "avgPrice": "0.00388359",
              "executedQty": "31.39000000",
              "orderId": 180015097,
              "price": "0.00388110",
              "qty": "31.39000000",
              "side": "SELL",
              "symbol": "BNBBTC",
              "timeInForce": "GTC",
              "isIsolated": ture,         //是否是逐倉
              "updatedTime": 1558941374745
          }
      ],
      "total": 1
  }

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/forceLiquidationRec (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    isolatedSymbol STRING NO
    current LONG NO 當前查詢頁。開始值1.默認:1
    size LONG NO 默認:10最大:100
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 響應返回為降序排列。

    查詢全倉槓桿帳戶詳情(USER_DATA)

    響應

    {
      "borrowEnabled": true,
      "marginLevel": "11.64405625",
      "totalAssetOfBtc": "6.82728457",
      "totalLiabilityOfBtc": "0.58633215",
      "totalNetAssetOfBtc": "6.24095242",
      "tradeEnabled": true,
      "transferEnabled": true,
      "userAssets": [
          {
              "asset": "BTC",
              "borrowed": "0.00000000",
              "free": "0.00499500",
              "interest": "0.00000000",
              "locked": "0.00000000",
              "netAsset": "0.00499500"
          },
          {
              "asset": "BNB",
              "borrowed": "201.66666672",
              "free": "2346.50000000",
              "interest": "0.00000000",
              "locked": "0.00000000",
              "netAsset": "2144.83333328"
          },
          {
              "asset": "ETH",
              "borrowed": "0.00000000",
              "free": "0.00000000",
              "interest": "0.00000000",
              "locked": "0.00000000",
              "netAsset": "0.00000000"
          },
          {
              "asset": "USDT",
              "borrowed": "0.00000000",
              "free": "0.00000000",
              "interest": "0.00000000",
              "locked": "0.00000000",
              "netAsset": "0.00000000"
          }
      ]
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/account (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    查詢槓桿帳戶訂單(USER_DATA)

    響應

    {
   "clientOrderId": "ZwfQzuDIGpceVhKW5DvCmO",
   "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.00000000",
   "executedQty": "0.00000000",
   "icebergQty": "0.00000000",
   "isWorking": true,
   "orderId": 213205622,
   "origQty": "0.30000000",
   "price": "0.00493630",
   "side": "SELL",
   "status": "NEW",
   "stopPrice": "0.00000000",
   "symbol": "BNBBTC",
   "isIsolated": true,       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
   "time": 1562133008725,
   "timeInForce": "GTC",
   "type": "LIMIT",
   "updateTime": 1562133008725
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/order (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    isIsolated STRING NO 是否逐倉槓桿，"TRUE","FALSE",默認"FALSE"
    orderId LONG NO
    origClientOrderId STRING NO
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 必須發送orderId或origClientOrderId其中一個。
    • {{一些历史订单的cummulativeQuoteQty<0,是指当前数据不存在。}}

    查詢槓桿帳戶掛單記錄(USER_DATA)

    響應

    [
   {
       "clientOrderId": "qhcZw71gAkCCTv0t0k8LUK",
       "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.00000000",
       "executedQty": "0.00000000",
       "icebergQty": "0.00000000",
       "isWorking": true,
       "orderId": 211842552,
       "origQty": "0.30000000",
       "price": "0.00475010",
       "side": "SELL",
       "status": "NEW",
       "stopPrice": "0.00000000",
       "symbol": "BNBBTC",
       "isIsolated": true,       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
       "time": 1562040170089,
       "timeInForce": "GTC",
       "type": "LIMIT",
       "updateTime": 1562040170089
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/openOrders (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING NO
    isIsolated STRING NO 是否逐倉槓桿，"TRUE","FALSE",默認"FALSE"
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 如未發送symbol，返回所有symbols訂單記錄。
    • 當返回所有symbols時，針對限速器計數的請求數量等於當前在交易所交易的symbols數量。
    • 如果isIsolated="TRUE",symbol為必填

    查詢槓桿帳戶的所有訂單(USER_DATA)

    響應

    [
      {
          "clientOrderId": "D2KDy4DIeS56PvkM13f8cP",
          "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.00000000",
          "executedQty": "0.00000000",
          "icebergQty": "0.00000000",
          "isWorking": false,
          "orderId": 41295,
          "origQty": "5.31000000",
          "price": "0.22500000",
          "side": "SELL",
          "status": "CANCELED",
          "stopPrice": "0.18000000",
          "symbol": "BNBBTC",
          "isIsolated": false,       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
          "time": 1565769338806,
          "timeInForce": "GTC",
          "type": "TAKE_PROFIT_LIMIT",
          "updateTime": 1565769342148
      },
      {
          "clientOrderId": "gXYtqhcEAs2Rn9SUD9nRKx",
          "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.00000000",
          "executedQty": "0.00000000",
          "icebergQty": "1.00000000",
          "isWorking": true,
          "orderId": 41296,
          "origQty": "6.65000000",
          "price": "0.18000000",
          "side": "SELL",
          "status": "CANCELED",
          "stopPrice": "0.00000000",
          "symbol": "BNBBTC",
          "isIsolated": false,       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
          "time": 1565769348687,
          "timeInForce": "GTC",
          "type": "LIMIT",
          "updateTime": 1565769352226
      }

]

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/allOrders (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 200

    訪問限制
    60次/分鐘/IP

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    isIsolated STRING NO 是否逐倉槓桿，"TRUE","FALSE",默認"FALSE"
    orderId LONG NO
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit INT NO 默認500;最大500.
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • {{如果设置orderId,获取订单>=orderId，否则返回近期订单历史。}}
    • {{一些历史订单的cummulativeQuoteQty<0,是指当前数据不存在。}}

    槓桿帳戶OCO下單(TRADE)

    響應

    {
  "orderListId": 0,
  "contingencyType": "OCO",
  "listStatusType": "EXEC_STARTED",
  "listOrderStatus": "EXECUTING",
  "listClientOrderId": "JYVpp3F0f5CAG15DhtrqLp",
  "transactionTime": 1563417480525,
  "symbol": "LTCBTC",
  "marginBuyBorrowAmount": "5",       //下單後沒有發生借款則不返回該字段
  "marginBuyBorrowAsset": "BTC",    //下單後沒有發生借款則不返回該字段
  "isIsolated": false,       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
  "orders": [
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "orderId": 2,
      "clientOrderId": "Kk7sqHb9J6mJWTMDVW7Vos"
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "orderId": 3,
      "clientOrderId": "xTXKaGYd4bluPVp78IVRvl"
    }
  ],
  "orderReports": [
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "orderId": 2,
      "orderListId": 0,
      "clientOrderId": "Kk7sqHb9J6mJWTMDVW7Vos",
      "transactTime": 1563417480525,
      "price": "0.000000",
      "origQty": "0.624363",
      "executedQty": "0.000000",
      "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.000000",
      "status": "NEW",
      "timeInForce": "GTC",
      "type": "STOP_LOSS",
      "side": "BUY",
      "stopPrice": "0.960664"
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "orderId": 3,
      "orderListId": 0,
      "clientOrderId": "xTXKaGYd4bluPVp78IVRvl",
      "transactTime": 1563417480525,
      "price": "0.036435",
      "origQty": "0.624363",
      "executedQty": "0.000000",
      "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.000000",
      "status": "NEW",
      "timeInForce": "GTC",
      "type": "LIMIT_MAKER",
      "side": "BUY"
    }
  ]
}

    POST /sapi/v1/margin/order/oco (HMAC SHA256)

    槓桿帳戶發送新OCO訂單。

    權重(UID): 6

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    isIsolated STRING NO 是否逐倉槓桿，"TRUE","FALSE",默認"FALSE"
    listClientOrderId STRING NO 整個orderList的唯一ID
    side ENUM YES 詳見枚舉定義：訂單方向
    quantity DECIMAL YES
    limitClientOrderId STRING NO 限價單的唯一ID
    price DECIMAL YES
    limitIcebergQty DECIMAL NO
    stopClientOrderId STRING NO 止損/止損限價單的唯一ID
    stopPrice DECIMAL YES
    stopLimitPrice DECIMAL NO 如果提供，須配合提交stopLimitTimeInForce
    stopIcebergQty DECIMAL NO
    stopLimitTimeInForce ENUM NO 有效值GTC/FOK/IOC
    newOrderRespType ENUM NO 詳見枚舉定義：訂單返回類型
    sideEffectType ENUM NO NO_SIDE_EFFECT,MARGIN_BUY,AUTO_REPAY;默認為NO_SIDE_EFFECT
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    其他信息:

    • 價格限制:
      • SELL{{:限价>最新成交价>触发价}}
      • BUY{{:限价<最新成交价<触发价}}
    • 數量限制:
      • 兩個legs必須具有同樣的數量。
      • ICEBERG數量不必相同
    • 下單rate
      • 一個OCO訂單被算成2個普通訂單.

    取消槓桿帳戶OCO訂單(TRADE)

    Response:

    {
  "orderListId": 0,
  "contingencyType": "OCO",
  "listStatusType": "ALL_DONE",
  "listOrderStatus": "ALL_DONE",
  "listClientOrderId": "C3wyj4WVEktd7u9aVBRXcN",
  "transactionTime": 1574040868128,
  "symbol": "LTCBTC",
  "isIsolated": false,       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
  "orders": [
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "orderId": 2,
      "clientOrderId": "pO9ufTiFGg3nw2fOdgeOXa"
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "orderId": 3,
      "clientOrderId": "TXOvglzXuaubXAaENpaRCB"
    }
  ],
  "orderReports": [
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "origClientOrderId": "pO9ufTiFGg3nw2fOdgeOXa",
      "orderId": 2,
      "orderListId": 0,
      "clientOrderId": "unfWT8ig8i0uj6lPuYLez6",
      "price": "1.00000000",
      "origQty": "10.00000000",
      "executedQty": "0.00000000",
      "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.00000000",
      "status": "CANCELED",
      "timeInForce": "GTC",
      "type": "STOP_LOSS_LIMIT",
      "side": "SELL",
      "stopPrice": "1.00000000"
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LTCBTC",
      "origClientOrderId": "TXOvglzXuaubXAaENpaRCB",
      "orderId": 3,
      "orderListId": 0,
      "clientOrderId": "unfWT8ig8i0uj6lPuYLez6",
      "price": "3.00000000",
      "origQty": "10.00000000",
      "executedQty": "0.00000000",
      "cummulativeQuoteQty": "0.00000000",
      "status": "CANCELED",
      "timeInForce": "GTC",
      "type": "LIMIT_MAKER",
      "side": "SELL"
    }
  ]
}

    DELETE /sapi/v1/margin/orderList (HMAC SHA256)

    取消槓桿帳戶訂單列表。

    權重(UID): 1

    參數

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    isIsolated STRING NO 是否逐倉槓桿，"TRUE","FALSE",默認"FALSE"
    orderListId LONG NO orderListId或listClientOrderId必須被提供
    listClientOrderId STRING NO orderListId或listClientOrderId必須被提供
    newClientOrderId STRING NO 用戶自定義的本次撤銷操作的ID(注意不是被撤銷的訂單的自定義ID)。如無指定會自動賦值。
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    其他注意點:

    • 取消單個leg將取消整個OCO訂單。

    查詢槓桿帳戶OCO(USER_DATA)

    響應

    {
    "orderListId": 27,
    "contingencyType": "OCO",
    "listStatusType": "EXEC_STARTED",
    "listOrderStatus": "EXECUTING",
    "listClientOrderId": "h2USkA5YQpaXHPIrkd96xE",
    "transactionTime": 1565245656253,
    "symbol": "LTCBTC",
    "isIsolated": true,       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
    "orders": [
        {
            "symbol": "LTCBTC",
            "orderId": 4,
            "clientOrderId": "qD1gy3kc3Gx0rihm9Y3xwS"
        },
        {
            "symbol": "LTCBTC",
            "orderId": 5,
            "clientOrderId": "ARzZ9I00CPM8i3NhmU9Ega"
        }
    ]
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/orderList (HMAC SHA256)

    根據提供的可選參數檢索特定的槓桿帳戶OCO訂單。

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    isIsolated STRING NO 是否逐倉槓桿，"TRUE","FALSE",默認"FALSE"
    symbol STRING NO 逐倉槓桿必填，全倉槓桿不支持該參數
    orderListId LONG NO orderListId或origClientOrderId必須提供一個。
    origClientOrderId STRING NO orderListId或origClientOrderId必須提供一個。
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不得大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    查詢特定槓桿帳戶所有OCO(USER_DATA)

    響應

    [
  {
    "orderListId": 29,
    "contingencyType": "OCO",
    "listStatusType": "EXEC_STARTED",
    "listOrderStatus": "EXECUTING",
    "listClientOrderId": "amEEAXryFzFwYF1FeRpUoZ",
    "transactionTime": 1565245913483,
    "symbol": "LTCBTC",

    "orders": [
      {
        "symbol": "LTCBTC",
        "orderId": 4,
