        "symbol": "LTCBTC",
        "orderId": 5,
        "clientOrderId": "Jr1h6xirOxgeJOUuYQS7V3"
      }
    ]
  },
  {
    "orderListId": 28,
    "contingencyType": "OCO",
    "listStatusType": "EXEC_STARTED",
    "listOrderStatus": "EXECUTING",
    "listClientOrderId": "hG7hFNxJV6cZy3Ze4AUT4d",
    "transactionTime": 1565245913407,
    "symbol": "LTCBTC",
    "orders": [
      {
        "symbol": "LTCBTC",
        "orderId": 2,
        "clientOrderId": "j6lFOfbmFMRjTYA7rRJ0LP"
      },
      {
        "symbol": "LTCBTC",
        "orderId": 3,
        "clientOrderId": "z0KCjOdditiLS5ekAFtK81"
      }
    ]
  }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/allOrderList (HMAC SHA256)

    根據提供的可選參數檢索特定槓桿帳戶所有的OCO訂單。

    權重(IP): 200

    參數

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    isIsolated STRING NO 是否逐倉槓桿，"TRUE","FALSE",默認"FALSE"
    symbol STRING NO 逐倉槓桿必填，全倉槓桿不支持該參數
    fromId LONG NO 提供該項後,startTime和endTime都不可提供
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit INT NO 默認值:500;最大值:1000
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能超過60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    查詢槓桿帳戶OCO掛單(USER_DATA)

    響應

    [
  {
    "orderListId": 31,
    "contingencyType": "OCO",
    "listStatusType": "EXEC_STARTED",
    "listOrderStatus": "EXECUTING",
    "listClientOrderId": "wuB13fmulKj3YjdqWEcsnp",
    "transactionTime": 1565246080644,
    "symbol": "LTCBTC",
    "isIsolated": true,       //是否是逐倉symbol交易
    "orders": [
      {
        "symbol": "LTCBTC",
        "orderId": 4,
        "clientOrderId": "r3EH2N76dHfLoSZWIUw1bT"
      },
      {
        "symbol": "LTCBTC",
        "orderId": 5,
        "clientOrderId": "Cv1SnyPD3qhqpbjpYEHbd2"
      }
    ]
  }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/openOrderList (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 10

    參數

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    isIsolated STRING NO 是否逐倉槓桿，"TRUE","FALSE",默認"FALSE"
    symbol STRING NO 逐倉槓桿必填，全倉槓桿不支持該參數
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    查詢槓桿帳戶交易歷史(USER_DATA)

    響應

    [
    {
        "commission": "0.00006000",
        "commissionAsset": "BTC",
        "id": 34,
        "isBestMatch": true,
        "isBuyer": false,
        "isMaker": false,
        "orderId": 39324,
        "price": "0.02000000",
        "qty": "3.00000000",
        "symbol": "BNBBTC",
        "isIsolated": false,      //是否是逐倉symbol交易
        "time": 1561973357171
    },
    {
        "commission": "0.00002950",
        "commissionAsset": "BTC",
        "id": 32,
        "isBestMatch": true,
        "isBuyer": false,
        "isMaker": true,
        "orderId": 39319,
        "price": "0.00590000",
        "qty": "5.00000000",
        "symbol": "BNBBTC",
        "isIsolated": false,      //是否是逐倉symbol交易
        "time": 1561964645345
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/myTrades (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    isIsolated STRING NO 是否逐倉槓桿，"TRUE","FALSE",默認"FALSE"
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    fromId LONG NO 獲取TradeId，默認獲取近期交易歷史。
    limit INT NO 默認500;最大1000.
    recvWindow LONG NO 默認值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • {{如果设置fromId,获取订单id>=fromId，否则返回近期订单历史。}}

    查詢帳戶最大可藉貸額度(USER_DATA)

    響應

    {
    "amount": "1.69248805", //系統可藉充足情況下用戶帳戶當前最大可借額度
    "borrowLimit": "60" 平台限制的用戶當前等級可以借的額度
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/maxBorrowable (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 50

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES
    isolatedSymbol STRING NO 逐倉交易對，適用於逐倉查詢
    recvWindow LONG NO 默認值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • borrowLimit的值也可以查看https://www.api.com/cn/margin-fee

    查詢最大可轉出額(USER_DATA)

    響應

     {
      "amount": "3.59498107"
 }

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/maxTransferable (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 50

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES
    isolatedSymbol STRING NO 逐倉交易對，適用於逐倉查詢
    recvWindow LONG NO 默認值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    槓桿逐倉帳戶劃轉(MARGIN)

    響應:

    {
    //transaction id
    "tranId": 100000001
}

    POST /sapi/v1/margin/isolated/transfer (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(UID): 600

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES 被劃轉的資產,比如,BTC
    symbol STRING YES 逐倉symbol
    transFrom STRING YES "SPOT", "ISOLATED_MARGIN"
    transTo STRING YES "SPOT", "ISOLATED_MARGIN"
    amount DECIMAL YES 劃轉數量
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    獲取槓桿逐倉劃轉歷史(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "rows": [
    {
      "amount": "0.10000000",
      "asset": "BNB",
      "status": "CONFIRMED",
      "timestamp": 1566898617000,
      "txId": 5240372201,
      "transFrom": "SPOT",
      "transTo": "ISOLATED_MARGIN"
    },
    {
      "amount": "5.00000000",
      "asset": "USDT",
      "status": "CONFIRMED",
      "timestamp": 1566888436123,
      "txId": 5239810406,
      "transFrom": "ISOLATED_MARGIN",
      "transTo": "SPOT"
    }
  ],
  "total": 2
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/isolated/transfer (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING NO
    symbol STRING YES 逐倉symbol
    transFrom STRING NO "SPOT", "ISOLATED_MARGIN"
    transTo STRING NO "SPOT", "ISOLATED_MARGIN"
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    current LONG NO 當前查詢頁。從1開始。默認:1
    size LONG NO 默認:10最大:100
    recvWindow LONG NO賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    查詢槓桿逐倉帳戶信息(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    不傳"symbols"的返回內容

    {
   "assets":[
      {
        "baseAsset":
          {
          "asset": "BTC",
          "borrowEnabled": true,
          "borrowed": "0.00000000",
          "free": "0.00000000",
          "interest": "0.00000000",
          "locked": "0.00000000",
          "netAsset": "0.00000000",
          "netAssetOfBtc": "0.00000000",
          "repayEnabled": true,
          "totalAsset": "0.00000000"
        },
        "quoteAsset":
        {
          "asset": "USDT",
          "borrowEnabled": true,
          "borrowed": "0.00000000",
          "free": "0.00000000",
          "interest": "0.00000000",
          "locked": "0.00000000",
          "netAsset": "0.00000000",
          "netAssetOfBtc": "0.00000000",
          "repayEnabled": true,
          "totalAsset": "0.00000000"
        },
        "symbol": "BTCUSDT"
        "isolatedCreated": true,
        "enabled": true, //帳戶是否啟用，true-啟用，false-停用
        "marginLevel": "0.00000000",
        "marginLevelStatus": "EXCESSIVE", // "EXCESSIVE", "NORMAL", "MARGIN_CALL", "PRE_LIQUIDATION", "FORCE_LIQUIDATION"
        "marginRatio": "0.00000000",
        "indexPrice": "10000.00000000",
        "liquidatePrice": "1000.00000000",
        "liquidateRate": "1.00000000",
        "tradeEnabled": true
      }
    ],
    "totalAssetOfBtc": "0.00000000",
    "totalLiabilityOfBtc": "0.00000000",
    "totalNetAssetOfBtc": "0.00000000"
}

    傳"symbols"的返回內容

    {
   "assets":[
      {
        "baseAsset":
        {
          "asset": "BTC",
          "borrowEnabled": true,
          "borrowed": "0.00000000",
          "free": "0.00000000",
          "interest": "0.00000000",
          "locked": "0.00000000",
          "netAsset": "0.00000000",
          "netAssetOfBtc": "0.00000000",
          "repayEnabled": true,
          "totalAsset": "0.00000000"
        },
        "quoteAsset":
        {
          "asset": "USDT",
          "borrowEnabled": true,
          "borrowed": "0.00000000",
          "free": "0.00000000",
          "interest": "0.00000000",
          "locked": "0.00000000",
          "netAsset": "0.00000000",
          "netAssetOfBtc": "0.00000000",
          "repayEnabled": true,
          "totalAsset": "0.00000000"
        },
        "symbol": "BTCUSDT"
        "isolatedCreated": true,
        "enabled": true, //帳戶是否啟用，true-啟用，false-停用
        "marginLevel": "0.00000000",
        "marginLevelStatus": "EXCESSIVE", // "EXCESSIVE", "NORMAL", "MARGIN_CALL", "PRE_LIQUIDATION", "FORCE_LIQUIDATION"
        "marginRatio": "0.00000000",
        "indexPrice": "10000.00000000",
        "liquidatePrice": "1000.00000000",
        "liquidateRate": "1.00000000",
        "tradeEnabled": true
      }
    ]
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/isolated/account (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbols STRING NO 最多可以傳5個symbol;由","分隔的字符串表示.e.g."BTCUSDT,BNBUSDT,ADAUSDT"
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 不傳"symbols",返回所有槓桿逐倉資產
    • 傳"symbols",將只會返回制定symbol的槓桿逐倉資產

    槓桿逐倉帳戶停用(TRADE)

    響應

    {
  "success": true,
  "symbol": "BTCUSDT"
}

    DELETE /sapi/v1/margin/isolated/account (HMAC SHA256)

    停用特定交易對的槓桿逐倉帳戶。每個交易對24小時內僅可停用一次。

    權重(UID): 300

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    槓桿逐倉帳戶啟用(TRADE)

    響應

    {
  "success": true,
  "symbol": "BTCUSDT"
}

    POST /sapi/v1/margin/isolated/account (HMAC SHA256)

    啟用特定交易對的槓桿逐倉帳戶（僅支持啟用之前停用的帳戶）。

    權重(UID): 300

    參數

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    查詢槓桿逐倉帳戶啟用限制(USER_DATA)

    響應

    {
  "enabledAccount": 5,
  "maxAccount": 20
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/isolated/accountLimit (HMAC SHA256)

    查詢槓桿逐倉帳戶啟用限制。

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    查詢逐倉槓桿交易對(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
   "symbol":"BTCUSDT",
   "base":"BTC",
   "quote":"USDT",
   "isMarginTrade":true,
   "isBuyAllowed":true,
   "isSellAllowed":true
}

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/isolated/pair (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    獲取所有逐倉槓桿交易對(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "base": "BNB",
        "isBuyAllowed": true,
        "isMarginTrade": true,
        "isSellAllowed": true,
        "quote": "BTC",
        "symbol": "BNBBTC"
    },
    {
        "base": "TRX",
        "isBuyAllowed": true,
        "isMarginTrade": true,
        "isSellAllowed": true,
        "quote": "BTC",
        "symbol": "TRXBTC"
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/isolated/allPairs (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    現貨交易和槓桿利息BNB抵扣開關(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
   "spotBNBBurn":true,
   "interestBNBBurn": false
}

    POST /sapi/v1/bnbBurn (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    spotBNBBurn STRING NO "true"or"false",是否使用BNB支付現貨交易的手續費
    interestBNBBurn STRING NO "true"or"false",是否使用BNB支付槓桿貸款的利息
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • "spotBNBBurn"和"interestBNBBurn"二者必須傳至少一個

    獲取BNB抵扣開關狀態(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
   "spotBNBBurn":true,
   "interestBNBBurn": false
}

    GET /sapi/v1/bnbBurn (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    獲取槓桿利率歷史(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "asset": "BTC",
        "dailyInterestRate": "0.00025000",
        "timestamp": 1611544731000,
        "vipLevel": 1
    },
    {
        "asset": "BTC",
        "dailyInterestRate": "0.00035000",
        "timestamp": 1610248118000,
        "vipLevel": 1
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/interestRateHistory (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES
    vipLevel INT NO 默認用戶當前等級
    startTime LONG NO 默認7天前
    endTime LONG NO 默認當天，時間間隔最大為1個月
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    獲取全倉槓桿利率及限額(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "vipLevel": 0,
        "coin": "BTC",
        "transferIn": true,
        "borrowable": true,
        "dailyInterest": "0.00026125",
        "yearlyInterest": "0.0953",
        "borrowLimit": "180",
        "marginablePairs": [
            "BNBBTC",
            "TRXBTC",
            "ETHBTC",
            "BTCUSDT"
        ]
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/crossMarginData (HMAC SHA256)

    通過VIP等級或用戶當前VIP等級獲取全倉槓桿利率及限額，如：https://www.api.com/en/margin-fee

    權重:1指定幣種;5幣種參數缺失

    參數(IP):

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    vipLevel INT NO 默認為用戶當前VIP等級
    coin STRING NO
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    獲取逐倉槓桿利率及限額(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "vipLevel": 0,
        "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
        "leverage": "10",
        "data": [
            {
                "coin": "BTC",
                "dailyInterest": "0.00026125",
                "borrowLimit": "270"
            },
            {
                "coin": "USDT",
                "dailyInterest": "0.000475",
                "borrowLimit": "2100000"
            }
        ]
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/isolatedMarginData (HMAC SHA256)

    通過VIP等級或用戶當前VIP等級獲取逐倉槓桿利率及限額，如：https://www.api.com/en/margin-fee

    權重(IP):1指定交易對;10交易對參數缺失

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    vipLevel INT NO 默認為用戶當前VIP等級
    symbol STRING NO
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    獲取逐倉檔位信息(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "symbol": "BTCUSDT",
        "tier": 1,
        "effectiveMultiple": "10",
        "initialRiskRatio": "1.111",
        "liquidationRiskRatio": "1.05",
        "baseAssetMaxBorrowable": "9",
        "quoteAssetMaxBorrowable": "70000"
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/margin/isolatedMarginTier (HMAC SHA256)

    通過檔位獲取逐倉槓桿檔位數據，如：https://www.api.com/en/margin-data

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    tier STRING NO 不傳則返回所有逐倉槓桿檔位
    recvWindow LONG NO 賦值不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    Websocket帳戶信息推送

    • 本篇所列出API接口的baseurl:https://api.api.com
    • 用於訂閱帳戶數據的listenKey從創建時刻起有效期為60分鐘
    • 可以通過PUT一個listenKey延長60分鐘有效期
    • 可以通過DELETE一個listenKey立即關閉當前數據流，並使該listenKey無效
    • 在具有有效listenKey的帳戶上執行POST將返回當前有效的listenKey並將其有效期延長60分鐘
    • websocket接口的baseurl:wss://stream.api.com:9443
    • U訂閱帳戶數據流的stream名稱為/ws/<listenKey>或/stream?streams=<listenKey>
    • 每個鏈接有效期不超過24小時，請妥善處理斷線重連。
    • 帳戶數據流的消息不保證嚴格時間序;請使用E字段進行排序

    ListenKey(現貨帳戶)

    生成ListenKey(USER_STREAM)

    響應

    {
  "listenKey": "pqia91ma19a5s61cv6a81va65sdf19v8a65a1a5s61cv6a81va65sdf19v8a65a1"
}

    POST /api/v3/userDataStream

    開始一個新的數據流。除非發送keepalive，否則數據流於60分鐘後關閉。如果該帳戶具有有效的listenKey，則將返回該listenKey並將其有效期延長60分鐘。權重: 1

    參數:

    NONE

    數據源:緩存

    延長ListenKey有效期(USER_STREAM)

    響應

    {}

    PUT /api/v3/userDataStream

    有效期延長至本次調用後60分鐘,建議每30分鐘發送一個ping。

    權重: 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    listenKey STRING YES

    數據源:緩存

    *关闭ListenKey(USER_STREAM)

    響應

    {}

    DELETE /api/v3/userDataStream

    *关闭用户数据流。

    權重: 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    listenKey STRING YES

    數據源:緩存

    *ListenKey(杠杆账户)

    生成ListenKey(USER_STREAM)

    響應

    {"listenKey":  "T3ee22BIYuWqmvne0HNq2A2WsFlEtLhvWCtItw6ffhhdmjifQ2tRbuKkTHhr"}

    POST /sapi/v1/userDataStream

    權重: 1

    參數:

    NONE

    *延长LisenKey有效期(USER_STREAM)

    響應

    {}

    PUT /sapi/v1/userDataStream

    權重: 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    listenKey STRING YES

    *关闭ListenKey(USER_STREAM)

    響應

    {}

    DELETE /sapi/v1/userDataStream

    權重: 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    listenKey STRING YES

    *ListenKey(逐仓杠杆账户)

    生成ListenKey(USER_STREAM)

    響應:

    {
    "listenKey":  "T3ee22BIYuWqmvne0HNq2A2WsFlEtLhvWCtItw6ffhhdmjifQ2tRbuKkTHhr"
}

    POST /sapi/v1/userDataStream/isolated

    權重: 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES

    *延长LisenKey有效期(USER_STREAM)

    響應:

    {}

    PUT /sapi/v1/userDataStream/isolated

    權重: 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    listenKey STRING YES

    *关闭ListenKey(USER_STREAM)

    響應:

    {}

    DELETE /sapi/v1/userDataStream/isolated

    權重: 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    symbol STRING YES
    listenKey STRING YES

    *Payload:账户更新

    *每当帐户余额发生更改时，都会发送一个事件outboundAccountPosition*，其中包含可能由生成余额变动的事件而变动的资产。

    Payload

    {
  "e": "outboundAccountPosition", //事件類型
  "E": 1564034571105,             //事件時間
  "u": 1564034571073,             *//账户末次更新时间戳
  "B": [                          *//余额
    {
      "a": "ETH",                 //資產名稱
      "f": "10000.000000",        //可用餘額
      "l": "0.000000"             *//冻结余额
    }
  ]
}

    *Payload:余额更新

    Payload

    {
  "e": "balanceUpdate",         //Event Type
  "E": 1573200697110,           //Event Time
  "a": "ABC",                   //Asset
  "d": "100.00000000",          //Balance Delta
  "T": 1573200697068            //Clear Time
}

    *当下列情形发生时更新:

    • *账户发生充值或提取
    • *交易账户之间发生划转(例如现货向杠杆账户划转)

    *Payload:订单更新

    *订单通过executionReport*事件进行更新。

    *请查阅文档公開API參數*以及以下文档，以获取相关的枚举定义。

    *通过将Z*除以z*可以找到平均价格。

    Payload

    {
  "e": "executionReport",        //事件類型
  "E": 1499405658658,            //事件時間
  "s": "ETHBTC",                 //交易對
  "c": "mUvoqJxFIILMdfAW5iGSOW", // clientOrderId
  "S": "BUY",                    //訂單方向
  "o": "LIMIT",                  //訂單類型
  "f": "GTC",                    //有效方式
  "q": "1.00000000",             //訂單原始數量
  "p": "0.10264410",             //訂單原始價格
  "P": "0.00000000",             *//止盈止损单触发价格
  "F": "0.00000000",             *//冰山订单数量
  "g": -1,                       *//OCO订单OrderListId
  "C": "",                       *//原始订单自定义ID(原始订单，指撤单操作的对象。撤单本身被视为另一个订单)
  "x": "NEW",                    //本次事件的具體執行類型
  "X": "NEW",                    //訂單的當前狀態
  "r": "NONE",                   *//订单被拒绝的原因
  "i": 4293153,                  // orderId
  "l": "0.00000000",             //訂單末次成交量
  "z": "0.00000000",             //訂單累計已成交量
  "L": "0.00000000",             //訂單末次成交價格
  "n": "0",                      *//手续费数量
  "N": null,                     *//手续费资产类别
  "T": 1499405658657,            //成交時間
  "t": -1,                       //成交ID
  "I": 8641984,                  *//请忽略
  "w": true,                     *//订单是否在订单簿上？
  "m": false,                    //該成交是作為掛單成交嗎？
  "M": false,                    *//请忽略
  "O": 1499405658657,            *//订单创建时间
  "Z": "0.00000000",             *//订单累计已成交金额
  "Y": "0.00000000",              *//订单末次成交金额
  "Q": "0.00000000"              // Quote Order Qty
}

    *执行类型:

    • *NEW新订单
    • *CANCELED订单被取消
    • *REPLACED(保留字段，当前未使用)
    • *REJECTED新订单被拒绝
    • *TRADE订单有新成交
    • *EXPIRED订单失效(根据订单的TimeInForce参数)

    *如果订单是OCO，则除了显示"executionReport"事件外，还将显示一个名为"ListStatus"的事件。

    Payload

    {
  "e": "listStatus",                //事件類型
  "E": 1564035303637,               //事件時間
  "s": "ETHBTC",                    //交易對
  "g": 2,                           // OrderListId
  "c": "OCO",                       // Contingency Type
  "l": "EXEC_STARTED",              // List Status Type
  "L": "EXECUTING",                 // List Order Status
  "r": "NONE",                      *//List被拒绝的原因
  "C": "F4QN4G8DlFATFlIUQ0cjdD",    // List Client Order ID
  "T": 1564035303625,               //成交時間
  "O": [
    {
      "s": "ETHBTC",                //交易對
      "i": 17,                      // orderId
      "c": "AJYsMjErWJesZvqlJCTUgL" // clientOrderId
    },
    {
      "s": "ETHBTC",
      "i": 18,
      "c": "bfYPSQdLoqAJeNrOr9adzq"
    }
  ]
}

    幣安寶接口

    • *这些接口用于币安宝产品。更多细节,请参考*币安宝*页面。

    *获取活期产品列表(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "asset": "BTC",
        "avgAnnualInterestRate": "0.00250025",
        "canPurchase": true,
        "canRedeem": true,
        "dailyInterestPerThousand": "0.00685000",
        "featured": true,
        "minPurchaseAmount": "0.01000000",
        "productId": "BTC001",
        "purchasedAmount": "16.32467016",
        "status": "PURCHASING",
        "upLimit": "200.00000000",
        "upLimitPerUser": "5.00000000"
    },
    {
        "asset": "BUSD",
        "avgAnnualInterestRate": "0.01228590",
        "canPurchase": true,
        "canRedeem": true,
        "dailyInterestPerThousand": "0.03836000",
        "featured": true,
        "minPurchaseAmount": "0.10000000",
        "productId": "BUSD001",
        "purchasedAmount": "10.38932339",
        "status": "PURCHASING",
        "upLimit": "100000.00000000",
        "upLimitPerUser": "50000.00000000"
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/lending/daily/product/list (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    status ENUM NO *"ALL","SUBSCRIBABLE","UNSUBSCRIBABLE";默认:"ALL"
    featured STRING NO *"ALL","TRUE";默认:"ALL"
    current LONG NO *当前页面.默认:1,最小:1
    size LONG NO *默认:50,最大:100
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    *获取用户当日剩余活期可申购余额(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "asset": "BUSD",
    "leftQuota": "50000.00000000"
}

    GET /sapi/v1/lending/daily/userLeftQuota (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    productId STRING YES
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    *申购活期产品(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "purchaseId": 40607
}

    POST /sapi/v1/lending/daily/purchase (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    productId STRING YES
    amount DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 您需要為APIKey開通允許現貨和槓桿交易權限才能發送此請求

    *获取用户当日活期可赎回余额(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "asset": "USDT",
    "dailyQuota": "10000000.00000000",
    "leftQuota": "0.00000000",
    "minRedemptionAmount": "0.10000000"
}

    GET /sapi/v1/lending/daily/userRedemptionQuota (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    productId STRING YES
    type ENUM YES "FAST", "NORMAL"
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    *赎回活期产品(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {}

    POST /sapi/v1/lending/daily/redeem (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    productId STRING YES
    amount DECIMAL YES
    type ENUM YES "FAST", "NORMAL"
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 您需要為APIKey開通允許現貨和槓桿交易權限才能發送此請求

    *用户活期产品持仓(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "annualInterestRate": "0.02600000",
        "asset": "USDT",
        "avgAnnualInterestRate": "0.02599895",
        "canRedeem": true,
        "dailyInterestRate": "0.00007123",
        "freeAmount": "75.46000000",
        "freezeAmount": "0.00000000", *//弃用
        "lockedAmount": "0.00000000", *//弃用
        "productId": "USDT001",
        "productName": "USDT",
        "redeemingAmount": "0.00000000",
        "todayPurchasedAmount": "0.00000000",
        "totalAmount": "75.46000000",
        "totalInterest": "0.22759183"
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/lending/daily/token/position (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    *查询定期/活动产品列表(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "asset": "USDT",
        "displayPriority": 1,
        "duration": 90,
        "interestPerLot": "1.35810000",
        "interestRate": "0.05510000",
        "lotSize": "100.00000000",
        "lotsLowLimit": 1,
        "lotsPurchased": 74155,
        "lotsUpLimit": 80000,
        "maxLotsPerUser": 2000,
        "needKyc": False,
        "projectId": "CUSDT90DAYSS001",
        "projectName": "USDT",
        "status": "PURCHASING",
        "type": "CUSTOMIZED_FIXED",
        "withAreaLimitation": False
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/lending/project/list (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING NO
    type ENUM YES *"CUSTOMIZED_FIXED"定期,"ACTIVITY"活动
    status ENUM NO *"ALL","SUBSCRIBABLE","UNSUBSCRIBABLE";默认"ALL"
    isSortAsc BOOLEAN NO *默认"true"
    sortBy ENUM NO *"START_TIME","LOT_SIZE","INTEREST_RATE","DURATION";默认"START_TIME"
    current LONG NO *分页页码.默认:1
    size LONG NO *单页显示条数，默认:10最大:100
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    *申购定期/活动产品(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    purchaseId: "18356"
}

    POST /sapi/v1/lending/customizedFixed/purchase (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    projectId STRING YES
    lot LONG YES *申购手数
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 您需要為APIKey開通允許現貨和槓桿交易權限才能發送此請求

    *用户定期/活动持仓(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "asset": "USDT",
        "canTransfer": True,
        "createTimestamp": 1587010770000,
        "duration": 14,
        "endTime": 1588291200000,
        "interest": "0.19950000",
        "interestRate": "0.05201250",
        "lot": 1,
        "positionId": 51724,
        "principal": "100.00000000",
        "projectId": "CUSDT14DAYSS001",
        "projectName": "USDT",
        "purchaseTime": 1587010771000,
        "redeemDate": "2020-05-01",
        "startTime": 1587081600000,
        "status": "HOLDING",
        "type": "CUSTOMIZED_FIXED"
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/lending/project/position/list (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES
    projectId STRING NO
    status ENUM NO "HOLDING", "REDEEMED"
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    *币安宝账户信息(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "positionAmountVos": [
        {
            "amount": "75.46000000",
            "amountInBTC": "0.01044819",
            "amountInUSDT": "75.46000000",
            "asset": "USDT"
        },
        {
            "amount": "1.67072036",
            "amountInBTC": "0.00023163",
            "amountInUSDT": "1.67289230",
            "asset": "BUSD"
        }
    ],
    "totalAmountInBTC": "0.01067982",
    "totalAmountInUSDT": "77.13289230",
    "totalFixedAmountInBTC": "0.00000000",
    "totalFixedAmountInUSDT": "0.00000000",
    "totalFlexibleInBTC": "0.01067982",
    "totalFlexibleInUSDT": "77.13289230"
 }

    GET /sapi/v1/lending/union/account (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES

    *获取申购记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    *活期产品

    [
    {
        "amount": "100.00000000",
        "asset": "USDT",
        "createTime": 1575018510000,
        "lendingType": "DAILY",
        "productName": "USDT",
        "purchaseId": 26055,
        "status": "SUCCESS"
    }
]

    *定期/活动产品

    [
    {
        "amount": "100.00000000",
        "asset": "USDT",
        "createTime": 1575018453000,
        "lendingType": "ACTIVITY",
        "lot": 1,
        "productName": "【Special】USDT 7D (8%)",
        "purchaseId": 36857,
        "status": "SUCCESS"
    },
    {
        "amount": "100.00000000",
        "asset": "USDT",
        "createTime": 1587010770000,
        "lendingType": "CUSTOMIZED_FIXED",
        "lot": 1,
        "productName": "USDT",
        "purchaseId": 55841,
        "status": 'SUCCESS'
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/lending/union/purchaseRecord (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    lendingType ENUM YES *"DAILY"表示活期,"ACTIVITI"表示活动,"CUSTOMIZED_FIXED"表示定期
    asset STRING NO
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    current LONG NO Currently querying page. Start from 1. Default:1
    size LONG NO Default:10, Max:100
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • startTime和endTime*的最大间隔为30天
    • 若startTime和endTime均未發送，則默認返回最近30天記錄

    *获取赎回记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    *活期产品

    [
    {
        "amount": "10.54000000",
        "asset": "USDT",
        "createTime": 1577257222000,
        "principal": "10.54000000",
        "projectId": "USDT001",
        "projectName": "USDT",
        "status": "PAID",
        "type": "FAST"
     }
]

    *定期/活动产品

    [
    {
        "amount": "0.07070000",
        "asset": "USDT",
        "createTime": 1566200161000,
        "interest": "0.00070000",
        "principal": "0.07000000",
        "projectId": "test06",
        "projectName": "USDT 1 day (10% anniualized)",
        "startTime": 1566198000000,
        "status": "PAID"
     }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/lending/union/redemptionRecord (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    lendingType ENUM YES *"DAILY"表示活期,"ACTIVITI"表示活动,"CUSTOMIZED_FIXED"表示定期
    asset STRING NO
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    current LONG NO Currently querying page. Start from 1. Default:1
    size LONG NO Default:10, Max:100
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • startTime和endTime*的最大间隔为30天
    • 若startTime和endTime均未發送，則默認返回最近30天記錄

    獲取利息歷史(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "asset": "BUSD",
        "interest": "0.00006408",
        "lendingType": "DAILY",
        "productName": "BUSD",
        "time": 1577233578000
    },
    {
        "asset": "USDT",
        "interest": "0.00687654",
        "lendingType": "DAILY",
        "productName": "USDT",
        "time": 1577233562000
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/lending/union/interestHistory (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    lendingType ENUM YES *"DAILY"表示活期,"ACTIVITY"表示活动,"CUSTOMIZED_FIXED"表示定期
    asset STRING NO
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    current LONG NO Currently querying page. Start from 1. Default:1
    size LONG NO Default:10, Max:100
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • startTime和endTime*的最大间隔为30天
    • 若startTime和endTime均未發送，則默認返回最近30天記錄

    *定期/活动持仓转活期持仓(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    
{
    "dailyPurchaseId": 862290,
    "success": true,
    "time": 1577233578000
 },

    POST /sapi/v1/lending/positionChanged (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    projectId STRING YES
    lot LONG YES
    positionId LONG NO
    recvWindow LONG NO 不能大於60000
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *定期持仓转活期持仓，需必填positionId
    • 您需要為APIKey開通允許現貨和槓桿交易權限才能發送此請求

    礦池接口

    • *这些接口作用于币安矿池。更多细节,参考*币安矿池*页面。

    *获取算法(MARKET_DATA)

    響應: 

    {
  "code": 0,
  "msg": "",
  "data": [
    {
      "algoName": "sha256",                        *//算法名称
      "algoId": 1,                                 *//算法id
      "poolIndex": 0,                               *//序列
      "unit": "h/s"                                *//单位
    }
  ]
}

    GET /sapi/v1/mining/pub/algoList (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *获取币种(MARKET_DATA)

    響應: 

    {
  "code": 0,
  "msg": "",
  "data": [
    {
      "coinName": "BTC",                      *//币种名称
      "coinId": 1,                            // id
      "poolIndex": 0,                         *//排序
      "algoId": 1,                            *//所属算法
      "algoName": "sha256"                    *//所属算法名称
    }
  ]
}

    GET /sapi/v1/mining/pub/coinList (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *请求矿工列表明细(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "code": 0,
  "msg": "",
  "data": [
    {
      "workerName": "bhdc1.16A10404B",     *//挖矿用户名
      "type": "H_hashrate",               *//小时算力类型
      "hashrateDatas": [
        {
          "time": 1587902400000,         //時間
          "hashrate": "0",               *//算力
          "reject": 0                    *//拒绝率
        },
        {
          "time": 1587906000000,
          "hashrate": "0",
          "reject": 0
        },
        .......
      ]
    },
    {
      "workerName": "bhdc1.16A10404B",    *//挖矿用户名
      "type": "D_hashrate",                *//日均算力类型
      "hashrateDatas": [
        {
          "time": 1587902400000,          //時間
          "hashrate": "0",                *//算力
          "reject": 0                     *//拒绝率
        },
        {
          "time": 1587906000000,
          "hashrate": "0",
          "reject": 0
        },
        .......
      ]
    }
  ]
}

    GET /sapi/v1/mining/worker/detail (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 5

    參數:

    Name Type Mandatory Description *例子
    algo STRING YES *算法名称(sha256) sha256
    userName STRING YES *挖矿用户名 test
    workerName STRING YES *矿工用户名，必传 bhdc1.16A10404B
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *请求矿工列表(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "code": 0,
  "msg": "",
  "data": {
    "workerDatas": [
      {
        "workerId": "1420554439452400131",  *//矿工id
        "workerName": "2X73",               *//矿工姓名
        "status": 3,                        *//状态：1有效，2无效，3失效
        "hashRate": 0,                      *//实时速率
        "dayHashRate": 0,                   *//日均算力
        "rejectRate": 0,                    *//实时拒绝率
        "lastShareTime": 1587712919000      *//最后提交时间
      },
      {
        "workerId": "7893926126382807951",
        "workerName": "AZDC1.1A10101",
        "status": 2,
        "hashRate": 29711247541680,
        "dayHashRate": 12697781298013.66,
        "rejectRate": 0,
        "lastShareTime": 1587969727000
      },
     ......
    ],
    "totalNum": 18530,           *//总数量
    "pageSize": 20               *//每页条数
  }
}

    GET /sapi/v1/mining/worker/list (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 5

    參數:

    Name Type Mandatory Description *例子
    algo STRING YES *算法名称(sha256) sha256
    userName STRING YES *挖矿用户名 test
    pageIndex INTEGER NO *页码，为空默认第一页，从1开始
    sort INTEGER NO *排序方向(为空默认为0):0正序，1倒序
    sortColumn INTEGER NO *排序字段(默认为1):
    *1:根据矿工名称排序，
    *2:根据实时算力排序，
    *3:根据日均算力排序，
    *4:根据实时拒绝率排序，5最后提交时间
    workerStatus INTEGER NO *矿机状态(默认为0)：0全部，1有效，2无效，3失效
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *收益列表(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "code": 0,
  "msg": "",
  "data": {
    "accountProfits": [
      {
        "time": 1586188800000,            //時間
        "type": 31, *//0:矿池钱包,5:地址挖矿,7:矿池宝,8:已转让,31:收益转让,32:算力转让-矿池钱包33:算力转让-矿池宝
        "hashTransfer": null,            *//已转让算力
        "transferAmount": null,          *//已转让收益
        "dayHashRate": 129129903378244,  *//算力
        "profitAmount": 8.6083060304,   *//奖励数量
        "coinName":"BTC",              *//奖励币种
        "status": 2    *//支付状态：0:待支付，1:支付中2：已支付
      },
      {
        "time": 1607529600000,
        "coinName": "BTC",
        "type": 0,
        "dayHashRate": 9942053925926,
        "profitAmount": 0.85426469,
        "hashTransfer": 200000000000,
        "transferAmount": 0.02180958,
        "status": 2
      },
      {
        "time": 1607443200000,
        "coinName": "BTC",
        "type": 31,
        "dayHashRate": 200000000000,
        "profitAmount": 0.02905916,
        "hashTransfer": null,
        "transferAmount": null,
        "status": 2
      }
    ],
    "totalNum": 3,          *//总条数
    "pageSize": 20          *//每页数量
  }
}

    GET /sapi/v1/mining/payment/list (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 5

    參數:

    Name Type Mandatory Description *例子
    algo STRING YES *算法名称(sha256) sha256
    userName STRING YES *挖矿用户名 test
    coin STRING NO *币种名称
    startDate Long NO *搜索日期毫秒时间戳，同时为空查询所有
    endDate Long NO *搜索日期毫秒时间戳，同时为空查询所有
    pageIndex INTEGER NO *页码，为空默认第一页，从1开始
    pageSize INTEGER NO *分页数量,最小10,最大200
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *其他收益列表(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "code": 0,
  "msg": "",
  "data": {
    "otherProfits": [
      {
        "time": 1607443200000,      //時間
        "coinName": "BTC",    *//奖励币种
        "type": 4,            *//1:联合挖矿，2:活动奖励,3:返点4:机枪奖励6:收益转让7:矿池宝
        "profitAmount": 0.0011859,  *//奖励数量
        "status": 2         *//支付状态：0:待支付，1:支付中2：已支付
      }
    ],
    "totalNum": 3,          *//总条数
    "pageSize": 20          *//每页数量
  }
}

    GET /sapi/v1/mining/payment/other (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 5

    參數:

    Name Type Mandatory Description *例子
    algo STRING YES *算法名称(sha256) sha256
    userName STRING YES *挖矿用户名 test
    coin STRING NO *币种名称
    startDate Long NO *搜索日期毫秒时间戳，同时为空查询所有
    endDate Long NO *搜索日期毫秒时间戳，同时为空查询所有
    pageIndex INTEGER NO *页码，为空默认第一页，从1开始
    pageSize INTEGER NO *分页数量,最小10,最大200
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *算力转让详情列表(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "code": 0,
  "msg": "",
  "data": {
    "configDetails": [
      {
        "configId": 168,     *//该配置的id
        "poolUsername": "123",  *//转出子账户
        "toPoolUsername": "user1", *//转入子账户
        "algoName": "Ethash",     *//转让算法名称
        "hashRate": 5000000,     *//转让算力
        "startDay": 20201210,   *//开始时间
        "endDay": 20210405,   *//结束时间
        "status": 1       *//状态：0进行中，1：已取消，2：已终止
      },
      {
        "configId": 166,
        "poolUsername": "pop",
        "toPoolUsername": "111111",
        "algoName": "Ethash",
        "hashRate": 3320000,
        "startDay": 20201226,
        "endDay": 20201227,
        "status": 0
      }
    ],
    "totalNum": 21,
    "pageSize": 200
  }
}

    GET /sapi/v1/mining/hash-transfer/config/details (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 5

    參數:

    Name Type Mandatory Description *例子
    pageIndex INTEGER NO *页码，为空默认第一页，从1开始
    pageSize INTEGER NO *分页数量,最小10,最大200
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *算力转让列表(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "code": 0,
  "msg": "",
  "data": {
    "configDetails": [
      {
        "configId": 168,     *//该配置的id
        "poolUsername": "123",  *//转出子账户
        "toPoolUsername": "user1", *//转入子账户
        "algoName": "Ethash",     *//转让算法名称
        "hashRate": 5000000,     *//转让算力
        "startDay": 20201210,   *//开始时间
        "endDay": 20210405,   *//结束时间
        "status": 1,       *//状态：0进行中，1：已取消，2：已终止
        "type": 0        *//状态：0算力转让记录，1算力接收记录
      },
      {
        "configId": 166,
        "poolUsername": "pop",
        "toPoolUsername": "111111",
        "algoName": "Ethash",
        "hashRate": 3320000,
        "startDay": 20201226,
        "endDay": 20201227,
        "status": 0,
        "type": 0
      }
    ],
    "totalNum": 21,
    "pageSize": 200
  }
}

    GET /sapi/v1/mining/hash-transfer/config/details/list (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 5

    參數:

    Name Type Mandatory Description *例子
    pageIndex INTEGER NO *页码，为空默认第一页，从1开始
    pageSize INTEGER NO *分页数量,最小10,最大200
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *算力转让详情(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "code": 0,
    "msg": "",
    "data": {
        "profitTransferDetails": [{
                "poolUsername": "test4001",  *//转出子账户
                "toPoolUsername": "pop",    *//转入子账户
                "algoName": "sha256",      *//转让算法名称
                "hashRate": 200000000000,  *//转让算力
                "day": 20201213,          *//转让日期
                "amount": 0.2256872,     *//转让收益
                "coinName": "BTC"        *//收益币种
            },
            {
                "poolUsername": "test4001",
                "toPoolUsername": "pop",
                "algoName": "sha256",
                "hashRate": 200000000000,
                "day": 20201213,
                "amount": 0.2256872,
                "coinName": "BTC"
            }
        ],
        "totalNum": 8,
        "pageSize": 200
    }
}

    GET /sapi/v1/mining/hash-transfer/profit/details (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 5

    參數:

    Name Type Mandatory Description *例子
    configId INTEGER YES *配置的id 168
    pageIndex INTEGER NO *页码，为空默认第一页，从1开始
    pageSize INTEGER NO *分页数量,最小10,最大200
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *算力转让请求(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "code": 0,
  "msg": "",
  "data": 171  *//该配置的id
}

    POST /sapi/v1/mining/hash-transfer/config (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 5

    參數:

    Name Type Mandatory Description *例子
    userName STRING YES *挖矿用户名 test
    algo STRING YES *算法名称(sha256) sha256
    endDate Long YES *转让结束时间(毫秒时间戳) 1617659086000
    startDate Long YES *转让结束时间(毫秒时间戳) 1607659086000
    toPoolUser STRING YES *挖矿用户名 S19pro
    hashRate Long YES *转让算力h/s必传(BTC大于500000000000ETH大于500000) 100000000
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *取消算力转让设置(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "code": 0,
  "msg": "",
  "data": true
}

    POST /sapi/v1/mining/hash-transfer/config/cancel (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 5

    參數:

    Name Type Mandatory Description *例子
    configId INTEGER YES *配置的id 168
    userName STRING YES *挖矿用户名 test
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *统计列表(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "code": 0,
  "msg": "",
  "data": {
    "fifteenMinHashRate": "457835490067496409.00000000",          *//15分钟算力
    "dayHashRate": "214289268068874127.65000000",                 *//日均算力
    "validNum": 0,                                                *//有效数量
    "invalidNum": 17562,                                          *//无效数量
    "profitToday":{                                              *//今日预估
      "BTC":"0.00314332",
      "BSV":"56.17055953",
      "BCH":"106.61586001"
     },
    "profitYesterday":{                                       *//昨日收益
      "BTC":"0.00314332",
       "BSV":"56.17055953",
       "BCH":"106.61586001"
     },

    "userName": "test",                                    *//挖矿账户
    "unit": "h/s",                                        *//算力单位
    "algo": "sha256"                                      *//所属算法
  }
}

    GET /sapi/v1/mining/statistics/user/status (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 5

    參數:

    Name Type Mandatory Description *例子
    algo STRING YES *算法名称(sha256) sha256
    userName STRING YES *挖矿用户名 test
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *账号列表(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "code": 0,
  "msg": "",
  "data": [
    {
      "type": "H_hashrate",        *//小时算力类型
      "userName": "test",         *//账户名
      "list": [
        {
          "time": 1585267200000,    //時間
          "hashrate": "0.00000000", *//算力
          "reject": "0.00000000"    *//拒绝率
        },
        {
          "time": 1585353600000,
          "hashrate": "0.00000000",
          "reject": "0.00000000"
        }
        ......
      ]
    },
    {
      "type": "D_hashrate",        *//日均算力类型
      "userName": "test",          *//账户名
      "list": [
        {
          "time": 1587906000000,     //時間
          "hashrate": "0.00000000", *//算力
          "reject": "0.00000000"    *//拒绝率
        },
        {
          "time": 1587909600000,
          "hashrate": "0.00000000",
          "reject": "0.00000000"
        }    ......
      ]
    }
  ]
}

    GET /sapi/v1/mining/statistics/user/list (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 5

    參數:

    Name Type Mandatory Description *例子
    algo STRING YES *算法名称(sha256) sha256
    userName STRING YES *挖矿用户名 test
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *矿池账户收益列表(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "code": 0,
  "msg": "",
  "data": {
    "accountProfits": [
      {
        "time": 1607443200000,      //時間
        "coinName": "BTC",   //幣種
        "type": 2,           *//0:邀请返佣1：邀请返现2：返点
        "puid": 59985472,    *//挖矿子账户id
        "subName": "vdvaghani", *//挖矿账户名
        "amount": 0.09186957    //數量
      }
    ],
    "totalNum": 3,          *//总条数
    "pageSize": 20          *//每页数量
  }
}

    GET /sapi/v1/mining/payment/uid (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 5

    參數:

    Name Type Mandatory Description *例子
    algo STRING YES *算法名称(sha256) sha256
    startDate Long NO *搜索日期毫秒时间戳，同时为空查询所有
    endDate Long NO *搜索日期毫秒时间戳，同时为空查询所有
    pageIndex INTEGER NO *页码，为空默认第一页，从1开始
    pageSize INTEGER NO *分页数量,最小10,最大200
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *合约接口

    • *列出为了服务于合约产品的接口

    *合约资金划转(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "tranId": 100000001    //劃轉ID
}

    POST /sapi/v1/futures/transfer (HMAC SHA256)

    *执行现货账户与合约账户之间的划转

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES The asset being transferred, e.g., USDT
    amount DECIMAL YES The amount to be transferred
    type INT YES 1:*现货账户向USDT合约账户划转
    2:*USDT合约账户向现货账户划转
    3:*现货账户向币本位合约账户划转
    4:*币本位合约账户向现货账户划转
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *获取合约资金划转历史(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "rows": [
    {
      "asset": "USDT",          //資產
      "tranId": 100000001,      //劃轉ID
      "amount": "40.84624400",  //數量
      "type": "1",              *//划转方向:1(现货向USDT本位合约),2(USDT本位合约向现货),3(现货向币本位合约),and4(币本位合约向现货)
      "timestamp": 1555056425000,   *//时间戳
      "status": "CONFIRMED"         *//PENDING(等待执行),CONFIRMED(成功划转),FAILED(执行失败);
    }
  ],
  "total": 1
}

    GET /sapi/v1/futures/transfer (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 10

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES
    startTime LONG YES
    endTime LONG NO
    current LONG NO *当前页面.起始计数为1.默认值1
    size LONG NO *单叶数据条目数，默认:10最大:100
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 僅支持查詢最近半年（6個月）數據
    • 若startTime和endTime沒傳，則默認返回最近7天數據

    *混合保证金借款(TRADE)

    響應:

    {
    "coin": "USDT",
    "amount": "4.50000000",
    "collateralCoin": "BUSD",
    "collateralAmount": "5.00000000",
    "time": 1582540328433,
    "borrowId": "438648398970089472"
}

    POST /sapi/v1/futures/loan/borrow (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    coin STRING YES
    amount DECIMAL YES when collateralAmount is empty
    collateralCoin STRING YES
    collateralAmount DECIMAL YES when amount is empty
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(UID): 3000

    *频次限制:
    *每个账户最多每秒一次

    *混合保证金借款历史(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "rows":[
        {
            "confirmedTime": 1582540328433,
            "coin": "USDT",
            "collateralRate": "0.89991001",  // collateralLevel
            "leftTotal": "4.5",
            "leftPrincipal": "4.5",
            "deadline": 4736102399000,
            "collateralCoin": "BUSD",
            "collateralAmount": "5.0",
            "orderStatus": "PENDING",
            "borrowId": "438648398970089472"
        }
    ],
    "total": 1
}

    GET /sapi/v1/futures/loan/borrow/history (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    coin STRING NO
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit LONG NO default 500, max 1000
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(IP): 10

    *混合保证金还款(TRADE)

    響應:

    {
    "coin": "USDT",
    "amount": "1.68",
    "collateralCoin": "BUSD",
    "repayId": "439659223998894080"
}

    POST /sapi/v1/futures/loan/repay (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    coin STRING YES
    collateralCoin STRING YES
    amount DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(UID): 3000

    Rate Limit:*每个账户最多每秒一次

    *混合保证金还款历史(USER_DATA)

    *相应:

    {
    "rows": [
        {
            "coin": "USDT",
            "amount": "1.68",
            "collateralCoin": "BUSD",
            "repayType": "NORMAL",    *//"COLLATERAL"则为抵押物还款
            "releasedCollateral": "1.80288889",
            "price": "1.001",    *//借贷/抵押物还款兑换价格比率
            "repayCollateral": "10010",    *//抵押物还款所用抵押物量
            "confirmedTime": 1582781327575,
            "updateTime": 1582794387516,    //時間
            "status": "PENDING",
            "repayId": "439659223998894080"
        }
    ],
    "total": 1
}

    GET /sapi/v1/futures/loan/repay/history HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    coin STRING NO
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit LONG NO default 500, max 1000
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(IP): 10

    *混合保证金钱包(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "totalCrossCollateral":"5.8238577133",
    "totalBorrowed":"5.07000000",
    "totalInterest":"0.0",   *//混合保证金总利息
    "interestFreeLimit": "100000", *//混合保证金总免息额度
    "asset": "USDT",
    "crossCollaterals":[
        {
            "collateralCoin":"BUSD",
            "locked":"5.82211108",
            "loanAmount": "5.07",
            "currentCollateralRate": "0.87168984",   // collateralLevel
            "interestFreeLimitUsed": "5.07", *//占用混合保证金免息额度
            "principalForInterest": "0.0",    *//混合保证金利息计算所用本金
            "interest": "0.0"    *//混合保证金利息
        },
        {
            "collateralCoin":"BTC",
            "locked":"0",
            "loanAmount": "0",
            "currentCollateralRate": "0",   // collateralLevel
            "interestFreeLimitUsed": "0", *//占用混合保证金免息额度
            "principalForInterest": "0.0",    *//混合保证金利息计算所用本金
            "interest": "0.0"    *//混合保证金利息
        }
    ]
}

    GET /sapi/v1/futures/loan/wallet (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(IP): 10

    *混合保证金钱包V2(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "totalCrossCollateral":"5.8238577133",
    "totalBorrowed":"5.07000000",
    "totalInterest":"0.0",   *//混合保证金总利息
    "interestFreeLimit": "100000", *//混合保证金总免息额度
    "asset": "USD", *//USD计价
    "crossCollaterals":[
        {
            "loanCoin":"USDT",
            "collateralCoin":"BUSD",
            "locked":"5.82211108",
            "loanAmount": "5.07",
            "currentCollateralRate": "0.87168984",   // collateralLevel
            "interestFreeLimitUsed": "5.07", *//占用混合保证金免息额度
            "principalForInterest": "0.0",    *//混合保证金利息计算所用本金
            "interest": "0.0"    *//混合保证金利息
        },
        {
            "loanCoin":"BUSD",
            "collateralCoin":"BTC",
            "locked":"0",
            "loanAmount": "0",
            "currentCollateralRate": "0",   // collateralLevel
            "interestFreeLimitUsed": "0", *//占用混合保证金免息额度
            "principalForInterest": "0.0",    *//混合保证金利息计算所用本金
            "interest": "0.0"    *//混合保证金利息
        }
    ]
}

    GET /sapi/v2/futures/loan/wallet (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(IP): 1

    *混合保证金信息(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "collateralCoin": "BUSD",
        "rate": "0.9",
        "marginCallCollateralRate": "0.95",
        "liquidationCollateralRate": "0.98",
        "currentCollateralRate": "0.87168984",
        "interestRate": "0.0",    *//混合保证金利率
        "interestGracePeriod": "0"    *//混合保证金免息期，天
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/futures/loan/configs (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    collateralCoin STRING NO
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *如果不传"collateralCoin"返回所有抵押物信息

    權重(IP): 10

    *混合保证金信息V2(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "loanCoin":"BUSD"
        "collateralCoin": "BTC",
        "rate": "0.9",
        "marginCallCollateralRate": "0.95",
        "liquidationCollateralRate": "0.98",
        "currentCollateralRate": "0.87168984",
        "interestRate": "0.0",    *//混合保证金利率
        "interestGracePeriod": "0"    *//混合保证金免息期，天
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v2/futures/loan/configs (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    loanCoin STRING NO
    collateralCoin STRING NO
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *如果不传"loanCoin"或"collateralCoin"返回所有借币和抵押物信息

    權重(IP): 1

    *计算调整后的混合保证金质押率(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "afterCollateralRate":"0.89736451"
}

    GET /sapi/v1/futures/loan/calcAdjustLevel (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    collateralCoin STRING YES
    amount DECIMAL YES
    direction ENUM YES "ADDITIONAL", "REDUCED"
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(IP): 50

    *计算调整后的混合保证金质押率V2(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "afterCollateralRate":"0.89736451"
}

    GET /sapi/v2/futures/loan/calcAdjustLevel (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    loanCoin STRING YES
    collateralCoin STRING YES
    amount DECIMAL YES
    direction ENUM YES "ADDITIONAL", "REDUCED"
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(IP): 1

    *可供调整混合保证金质押率的最大额(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "maxInAmount": "9.97109038",
    "maxOutAmount": "0.50952693"
}

    GET /sapi/v1/futures/loan/calcMaxAdjustAmount (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    collateralCoin STRING YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(IP): 50

    *可供调整混合保证金质押率的最大额V2(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "maxInAmount": "9.97109038",
    "maxOutAmount": "0.50952693"
}

    GET /sapi/v2/futures/loan/calcMaxAdjustAmount (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    loanCoin STRING YES
    collateralCoin STRING YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(IP): 1

    *调整混合保证金质押率(TRADE)

    響應:

    {
    "collateralCoin": "BUSD",
    "direction": "ADDITIONAL",
    "amount": "5.00000000",
    "time": 1583540328433
}

    POST /sapi/v1/futures/loan/adjustCollateral (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    collateralCoin STRING YES
    amount DECIMAL YES
    direction ENUM YES "ADDITIONAL", "REDUCED"
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(UID): 3000

    RateLimit:*每个账户最多每秒一次

    *调整混合保证金质押率V2(TRADE)

    響應:

    {
    "loanCoin": "BUSD"
    "collateralCoin": "BTC",
    "direction": "ADDITIONAL",
    "amount": "5.00000000",
    "time": 1583540328433
}

    POST /sapi/v2/futures/loan/adjustCollateral (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    loanCoin STRING YES
    collateralCoin STRING YES
    amount DECIMAL YES
    direction ENUM YES "ADDITIONAL", "REDUCED"
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    RateLimit:*每个账户最多每秒一次

    *混合保证金调整质押率历史(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "rows":[
        {
            "amount": ".17398184".
            "collateralCoin": "BUSD",
            "coin": "USDT",
            "preCollateralRate":"0.87054861",
            "afterCollateralRate":"0.89736451",
            "direction": "REDUCED",
            "status": "COMPLETED",
            "adjustTime": 1583978243588
        }
    ],
    "total": 1
}

    GET /sapi/v1/futures/loan/adjustCollateral/history (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    Name Type Mandatory Description
    loanCoin STRING NO
    collateralCoin STRING NO
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit LONG NO default 500, max 1000
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *如果不传"loanCoin"或"collateralCoin"返回所有借币和抵押物信息

    權重(IP): 10

    *混合保证金强平历史(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "rows":[
        {
            "collateralAmountForLiquidation":"10.12345678",
            "collateralCoin": "BUSD",
            "forceLiquidationStartTime": 1583978243588,
            "coin": "USDT",
            "restCollateralAmountAfterLiquidation": "15.12345678",
            "restLoanAmount": "11.12345678",
            "status": "PENDING"
        }
    ],
    "total": 1
}

    GET /sapi/v1/futures/loan/liquidationHistory (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    loanCoin STRING NO
    collateralCoin STRING NO
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit LONG NO default 500, max 1000
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *如果不传"loanCoin"或"collateralCoin"返回所有借币和抵押物信息

    權重(IP): 10

    *混合保证金抵押物还款上下限(USER_DATA)

    *查询混合保证金以抵押物还款的上下限

    響應:

    {
    "coin": "USDT",
    "collateralCoin": "BTC",
    "max": "15000",
    "min": "15"
}

    GET /sapi/v1/futures/loan/collateralRepayLimit (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    coin STRING YES
    collateralCoin STRING YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(IP): 1

    *获取混合保证金抵押物还款兑换比率(USER_DATA)

    *混合保证金以抵押物还款前需先获取兑换比率得到quoteId*才能请求以抵押物还款，兑换比率有效期为25秒

    響應:

    {
    "coin": "USDT",
    "collateralCoin": "BTC",
    "amount": "0.00222",
    "quoteId": "8a03da95f0ad4fdc8067e3b6cde72423"
}

    GET /sapi/v1/futures/loan/collateralRepay (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    coin STRING YES
    collateralCoin STRING YES
    amount DECIMAL YES *还款量
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(IP): 1

    *混合保证金抵押物还款(TRADE)

    *混合保证金以抵押物还款前需先获取兑换比率得到quoteId*才能请求以抵押物还款，兑换比率有效期为25秒

    響應:

    {
    "coin": "USDT",
    "collateralCoin": "BTC",
    "amount": "30",
    "quoteId": "3eece81ca2734042b2f538ea0d9cbdd3"
}

    POST /sapi/v1/futures/loan/collateralRepay (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    quoteId STRING YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(IP): 1

    *混合保证金抵押物还款结果(USER_DATA)

    *查询混合保证金抵押物还款结果

    響應:

    {
    "quoteId": "3eece81ca2734042b2f538ea0d9cbdd3",
    "status": "SUCCESS"
}

    GET /sapi/v1/futures/loan/collateralRepayResult (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    quoteId STRING YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(IP): 1

    *混合保证金利息收取历史(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "rows":[
        {
            "collateralCoin": "BUSD",
            "interestCoin": "USDT",
            "interest": "2.354",
            "interestFreeLimitUsed": "0", *//占用混合保证金免息额度
            "principalForInterest": "10000",
            "interestRate": "0.002",
            "time": 1582794387516
        }
    ],
    "total": 1
}

    GET /sapi/v1/futures/loan/interestHistory (HMAC SHA256)

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    collateralCoin STRING NO
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    current LONG NO 當前查詢頁。開始值1。默認:1
    limit LONG NO *默认500，最大1000
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    權重(IP): 1

    *杠杆代币接口

    *杠杆代币信息(MARKET_DATA)

    響應:

    [
  {
    "tokenName": "BTCDOWN",
    "description": "3X Short Bitcoin Token",
    "underlying": "BTC",
    "tokenIssued": "717953.95",
    "basket": "-821.474 BTCUSDT Futures",
    "currentBaskets":[
       {
         "symbol":"BTCUSDT",
         "amount":"-1183.984",
         "notionalValue":"-22871089.96704"
       }
     ],
    "nav": "4.79",
    "realLeverage": "-2.316",
    "fundingRate": "0.001020",
    "dailyManagementFee": "0.0001",
    "purchaseFeePct": "0.0010",  *//申购费率
    "dailyPurchaseLimit": "100000.00",  *//每日申购数量上限
    "redeemFeePct": "0.0010",  *//赎回费率
    "dailyRedeemLimit": "1000000.00",  *//每日赎回数量上限
    "timestamp":1583127900000
  },
  {
    "tokenName": "LINKUP",
    "description": "3X LONG ChainLink Token",
    "underlying": "LINK",
    "tokenIssued": "163846.99",
    "basket": "417288.870 LINKUSDT Futures",
    "currentBaskets":[
       {
         "symbol":"LINKUSDT",
         "amount":"1640883.83",
         "notionalValue":"22596611.22293"
       }
     ],
    "nav": "9.60",
    "realLeverage": "2.597",
    "fundingRate": "-0.000917",
    "dailyManagementFee": "0.0001",
    "purchaseFeePct": "0.0010",
    "dailyPurchaseLimit": "100000.00",
    "redeemFeePct": "0.0010",
    "dailyRedeemLimit": "1000000.00",
    "timestamp":1583127900000
  },
 ]

    GET /sapi/v1/blvt/tokenInfo

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    tokenName STRING NO BTCDOWN, BTCUP

    *杠杆代币历史净值K线

    *杠杆代币净值系统基于合约架构，故该接口采用fapi

    *请前往這裡*查看相关接口，并按照fapi使用规范操作。

    *申购代币(USER_DATA)

    響應:

     {
    "id": 123,
    "status": "S", *//S,P,F分别表示"success","pending","failure"
    "tokenName": "LINKUP",
    "amount": "0.95590905", *//申购代币数量
    "cost": "9.99999995", *//申购金额
    "timestamp":1600249972899
 }

    POST /sapi/v1/blvt/subscribe (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    tokenName STRING YES BTCDOWN, BTCUP
    cost DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 您需要為APIKey開通允許現貨和槓桿交易權限才能發送此請求

    *查询申购记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
  {
    "id": 1,
    "tokenName": "LINKUP",
    "amount": "0.54216292",
    "nav": "18.42621386",  *//usdt计价的申购净值
    "fee": "0.00999000", *//usdt计价的申购费用
    "totalCharge": "9.99999991", *//usdt计价的申购总金额
    "timestamp":1599127217916
  }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/blvt/subscribe/record (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    tokenName STRING NO BTCDOWN, BTCUP
    id LONG NO
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit INT NO *默认1000,最大1000
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *只可查询最近90天记录

    *赎回代币(USER_DATA)

    響應:

     {
    "id": 123,
    "status": "S", *//S,P,F分别表示"success","pending","failure"
    "tokenName": "LINKUP",
    "redeemAmount": "0.95590905",       *//赎回代币数量
    "amount": "10.05022099",    *//usdt计价的赎回金额
    "timestamp":1600250279614
 }

    POST /sapi/v1/blvt/redeem (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    tokenName STRING YES BTCDOWN, BTCUP
    amount DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 您需要為APIKey開通允許現貨和槓桿交易權限才能發送此請求

    *查询赎回记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
  {
    "id": 1,
    "tokenName": "LINKUP",
    "amount": "0.54216292", *//赎回数量
    "nav": "18.36345064",  *//usdt计价的赎回净值
    "fee": "0.00995598", *//usdt计价的赎回费用
    "netProceed": "9.94602604", *//usdt计价的净赎回金额
    "timestamp":1599128003050
  }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/blvt/redeem/record (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    tokenName STRING NO BTCDOWN, BTCUP
    id LONG NO
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit INT NO *默认1000,最大1000
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *只可查询最近90天记录

    *查询用户每日申购赎回限额(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
  {
    "tokenName": "LINKUP",
    "userDailyTotalPurchaseLimit": "1000", *//用户个人每日申购数量上限（USDT)
    "userDailyTotalRedeemLimit": "1000"    *//用户个人每日赎回数量上限(USDT)
  },
  {
    "tokenName": "LINKDOWN",
    "userDailyTotalPurchaseLimit": "1000", *//用户个人每日申购数量上限（USDT)
    "userDailyTotalRedeemLimit": "50000"   *//用户个人每日赎回数量上限(USDT)
  }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/blvt/userLimit (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    tokenName STRING NO BTCDOWN, BTCUP
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *Websocket杠杆代币信息更新

    *杠杆代币净值系统基于合约架构，故该推送采用合约WS服务。

    *请前往這裡*查看相关接口，并按照fstream或fstream3使用规范操作。

    *Websocket杠杆代币净值K线更新

    *杠杆代币净值系统基于合约架构，故该推送采用合约WS服务。

    *请前往這裡*查看相关接口，并按照fstream或fstream3使用规范操作。

    *币安挖矿接口

    • *这些接口用于币安挖矿产品。更多细节,请参考*币安挖矿*页面。

    *获取所有流动资金池(MARKET_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "poolId": 2,
        "poolName": "BUSD/USDT",
        "assets": [
            "BUSD",
            "USDT"
        ]
    },
    {
        "poolId": 3,
        "poolName": "BUSD/DAI",
        "assets": [
            "BUSD",
            "DAI"
        ]
    },
    {
        "poolId": 4,
        "poolName": "USDT/DAI",
        "assets": [
            "USDT",
            "DAI"
        ]
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/bswap/pools

    *获取币安挖矿产品中所有资金池

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:*无

    *获取流动资金池具体信息(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "poolId": 2,
        "poolNmae": "BUSD/USDT",
        "updateTime": 1565769342148,
        "liquidity": {
            "BUSD": 100000315.79,
            "USDT": 99999245.54
        },
        "share": {
            "shareAmount": 12415,
            "sharePercentage": 0.00006207,
            "asset": {
                "BUSD": 6207.02,
                "USDT": 6206.95
            }
        }
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/bswap/liquidity (HMAC SHA256)

    *获取某个流动资金池具体信息

    權重(IP):

    1*单一池

    10*poolId参数缺失

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    poolId LONG NO
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *添加流动性(TRADE)

    響應:

    {
    "operationId": 12341
}

    POST /sapi/v1/bswap/liquidityAdd (HMAC SHA256)

    *向某个资金池添加流动性

    權重(UID):*1000（额外限制：每3秒一次）

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    poolId LONG YES
    type STRING NO *"Single"为单币添加资产;"Combination"为双币添加资产。默认"Single"
    asset STRING YES
    quantity DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 您需要為APIKey開通允許現貨和槓桿交易權限才能發送此請求

    *移除流动性(TRADE)

    響應:

    {
    "operationId": 12341
}

    POST /sapi/v1/bswap/liquidityRemove (HMAC SHA256)

    *从某个资金池移除流动性，type*包含SINGLE和COMBINATION*，如果是单币种移除则asset*参数为必需

    權重(UID):*1000（额外限制：每3秒一次）

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    poolId LONG YES
    type STRING YES SINGLE*为以单币种移出,COMBINATION*为以池中所有币种按比例移出
    asset LIST NO *如果是单币种移除则asset*参数为必需
    shareAmount DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 您需要為APIKey開通允許現貨和槓桿交易權限才能發送此請求

    *获取流动性操作记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "operationId": 12341,
        "poolId": 2,
        "poolName": "BUSD/USDT",
        "operation": "ADD", // "ADD" or "REMOVE"
        "status": 1, // 0: pending, 1: success, 2: failed 
        "updateTime": 1565769342148,
        "shareAmount": "10.1"
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/bswap/liquidityOps (HMAC SHA256)

    *获取流动性操作（添加/移除）记录

    權重(UID): 3000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    operationId LONG NO
    poolId LONG NO
    operation ENUM NO ADD或REMOVE
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit LONG NO *默认3,最大100
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *获取报价(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
    "quoteAsset": "USDT",
    "baseAsset": "BUSD",
    "quoteQty": 300000,
    "baseQty": 299975,
    "price": 1.00008334,
    "slippage": 0.00007245,
    "fee": 120
}

    GET /sapi/v1/bswap/quote (HMAC SHA256)

    *通过传入计价币（卖出币）与交易币（买入币）获取报价，即给定量的兑换汇率。quoteQty*为卖出币数量。注意该报价为参考，实际会随流动性变动而变化，推荐在获取报价之后立刻进行兑换交易以避免滑点变化过大。

    權重(UID): 150

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    quoteAsset STRING YES
    baseAsset STRING YES
    quoteQty DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *交易(TRADE)

    響應:

    {
    "swapId": 2314
}

    POST /sapi/v1/bswap/swap (HMAC SHA256)

    *交易，即兑换quoteAsset為baseAsset。

    權重(UID):*1000（额外限制：每3秒一次）

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    quoteAsset STRING YES
    baseAsset STRING YES
    quoteQty DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 您需要為APIKey開通允許現貨和槓桿交易權限才能發送此請求

    *获取交易记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "swapId": 2314,
        "swapTime": 1565770342148,
        "status": 0, // 0: pending, 1: success, 2: failed 
        "quoteAsset": "USDT",
        "baseAsset": "BUSD",
        "quoteQty": 300000,
        "baseQty": 299975,
        "price": 1.00008334,
        "fee": 120
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/bswap/swap (HMAC SHA256)

    *获取交易历史记录。

    權重(UID): 3000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    swapId LONG NO
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    status INT NO *0:交易中,1:交易成功,2:交易失败
    quoteAsset STRING NO
    baseAsset STRING NO
    limit LONG NO *默认3,最大100
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *获取币对池的配置信息(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "poolId": 2,
        "poolNmae": "BUSD/USDT",
        "updateTime": 1565769342148,
        "liquidity": {
            "constantA": 2000, *//如果为创新池则展示“NA”
            "minRedeemShare": 0.1,
            "slippageTolerance":0.2 *//仅当滑点在区间内才执行交易
        },
        "assetConfigure":{
            "BUSD": {
                "minAdd":10,
                "maxAdd": 20,
                "minSwap": 10,
                "maxSwap": 30
            },
            "USDT": {
                "minAdd":10,
                "maxAdd": 20,
                "minSwap": 10,
                "maxSwap": 30
            }
        }
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/bswap/poolConfigure (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 150

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    poolId LONG NO
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *添加流动性的试算(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
        "quoteAsset": "USDT",
        "baseAsset": "BUSD", *//类型为"COMBINATION"时展示
        "quoteAmt": 300000,
        "baseAmt": 299975, *//类型为"COMBINATION"时展示
        "price": 1.00008334,
        "share":1.23,
        "slippage": 0.00007245, *//类型为"SINGLE"时展示
        "fee": 120, *//类型为"SINGLE"时展示
}

    GET /sapi/v1/bswap/addLiquidityPreview (HMAC SHA256)

    *计算查询单币添加或双币添加流动性需要的资产数量及获得的份额

    權重(IP): 150

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    poolId LONG YES
    type STRING YES *类型为"SINGLE"意思为单币添加;类型为"COMBINATION"意思为双币添加
    quoteAsset STRING YES
    quoteQty DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *移除流动性的试算(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
        "quoteAsset": "USDT",
        "baseAsset": "BUSD", *//类型为"COMBINATION"时展示
        "quoteAmt": 300000,
        "baseAmt": 299975, *//类型为"COMBINATION"时展示
        "price": 1.00008334,
        "slippage": 0.00007245, *//类型为"SINGLE"时展示
        "fee": 120 *//类型为"SINGLE"时展示
}

    GET /sapi/v1/bswap/removeLiquidityPreview (HMAC SHA256)

    *计算查询单币赎回或双币赎回预计获得的资产数量

    權重(IP): 150

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    poolId LONG YES
    type STRING YES *类型为"SINGLE"意思为移除获得单币；类型为"COMBINATION"意思为移除获得双币
    quoteAsset STRING YES
    shareAmount DECIMAL YES
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *查询未领取的奖励数量(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
        "totalUnclaimedRewards": {
            "BUSD": 100000315.79,
            "BNB": 0.00000001,
            "USDT": 0.00000002
         },
    "details":{
            "BNB/USDT":{
                "BUSD": 100000315.79,
                "USDT": 0.00000002
                },
            "BNB/BTC":{
                "BNB": 0.00000001
                }
        }
}

    GET /sapi/v1/bswap/unclaimedRewards (HMAC SHA256)

    *查询未领取的奖励数量

    權重(UID): 1000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    type INT NO *0:交易挖矿奖励，1:流动性挖矿奖励，默认为0
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *领取奖励(TRADE)

    響應:

    {
    "success":true
}

    POST /sapi/v1/bswap/claimRewards (HMAC SHA256)

    *领取交易挖矿奖励或者流动性挖矿奖励

    權重(UID): 1000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    type INT NO *0:交易挖矿奖励，1:流动性挖矿奖励，默认为0
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • 您需要為APIKey開通允許現貨和槓桿交易權限才能發送此請求

    *获取已领取奖励记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
    {
        "poolId":52,
        "poolName":"BNB/USDT",
        "assetRewards": "BNB",
        "claimTime":1565769342148,
        "claimAmount":0.00000023,
        "status":1 // 0: pending, 1: success
    }
]

    GET /sapi/v1/bswap/claimedHistory (HMAC SHA256)

    *获取已领取奖励的历史记录

    權重(UID): 1000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    poolId LONG NO
    assetRewards STRING NO
    type INT NO *0:交易挖矿奖励，1:流动性挖矿奖励，默认为0
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit LONG NO Default 3, max 100
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES

    *法币接口

    *获取法币充值/提现历史记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
   "code": "000000",
   "message": "success",
   "data": [
   {
      "orderNo":"7d76d611-0568-4f43-afb6-24cac7767365",
      "fiatCurrency": "BRL", *//法币token
      "indicatedAmount": "10.00",  *//交易金额
      "amount": "10.00",    *//实际金额（扣除手续费）
      "totalFee": "0.00",   *//交易手续费
      "method": "BankAccount",  *//交易方式
      "status": "Expired",  // Processing, Failed, Successful, Finished, Refunding, Refunded, Refund Failed, Order Partial credit Stopped
      "createTime": 1626144956000,  *//订单创建时间
      "updateTime": 1626400907000   *//订单更新时间
   }
   ],
   "total": 1,
   "success": true
}

    GET /sapi/v1/fiat/orders (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    transactionType STRING YES 0-deposit,1-withdraw
    beginTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    page INT NO 默認1
    rows INT NO *默认100,最大500
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *若beginTime和endTime均未发送,只返回最近30天数据

    *获取法币支付历史记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
   "code": "000000",
   "message": "success",
   "data": [
   {
      "orderNo": "353fca443f06466db0c4dc89f94f027a",
      "sourceAmount": "20.0",  *//法币交易数量
      "fiatCurrency": "EUR",   *//法币token
      "obtainAmount": "4.462", *//数字货币交易数量
      "cryptoCurrency": "LUNA",  *//数字货币token
      "totalFee": "0.2",     *//交易手续费
      "price": "4.437472",   //價格
      "status": "Failed",  *//Processing处理中,Completed完成,Failed失败,Refunded退款
      "createTime": 1624529919000, *//订单创建时间
      "updateTime": 1624529919000  *//订单更新时间
   }
   ],
   "total": 1,
   "success": true
}

    GET /sapi/v1/fiat/payments (HMAC SHA256)

    Weight(IP): 1

    Parameters:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    transactionType STRING YES 0-buy,1-sell
    beginTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    page INT NO 默認1
    rows INT NO *默认100,最大500
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *若beginTime和endTime均未发送,只返回最近30天数据

    *C2C接口

    *获取C2C交易历史记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
   "code": "000000",
   "message": "success",
   "data": [
   {
      "orderNumber":"20219644646554779648",
      "advNo": "11218246497340923904",
      "tradeType": "SELL",
      "asset": "BUSD",
      "fiat": "CNY",
      "fiatSymbol": "￥",
      "amount": "5000.00000000",  // Quantity (in Crypto)
      "totalPrice": "33400.00000000",
      "unitPrice": "6.68", // Unit Price (in Fiat)
      "orderStatus": "COMPLETED",  // PENDING, TRADING, BUYER_PAYED, DISTRIBUTING, COMPLETED, IN_APPEAL, CANCELLED, CANCELLED_BY_SYSTEM
      "createTime": 1619361369000,
      "commission": "0",  // Transaction Fee (in Crypto)
      "counterPartNickName": *"阿涛❤***",
      "advertisementRole": "TAKER"
     }
   ],
   "total": 1,
   "success": true
}

    GET /sapi/v1/c2c/orderMatch/listUserOrderHistory (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(IP): 1

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    tradeType STRING YES BUY, SEll
    startTimestamp LONG NO
    endTimestamp LONG NO
    page INT NO default 1
    rows INT NO default 100, max 100
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *若startTimestamp和endTimestamp均未发送,只返回最近30天数据
    • *startTimestamp和endTimestamp的最大时间间隔为30天

    *质押借币接口

    *获取质押借币资金流水(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    [
   {
        "asset": "BUSD",
        "type": "borrowIn",
        "amount": "100",
        "timestamp": 1633771139847,
        "tranId": "80423589583"
    },
    {
        "asset": "BUSD",
        "type": "borrowIn",
        "amount": "100",
        "timestamp": 1634638371496,
        "tranId": "81685123491"
    }
 ]

    GET /sapi/v1/loan/income (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(UID): 6000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    asset STRING YES
    type STRING NO *默认返回所有类型枚举值：借入borrowIn*,抵押金使用collateralSpent*,还款金额repayAmount*,抵押物返还collateralReturn*,增加抵押物addCollateral*,减少抵押物removeCollateral*,强平后返还抵押物collateralReturnAfterLiquidation
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit INT NO *默认20,最大100
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *若startTime和endTime均未发送,只返回最近7天数据
    • *startTime和endTime的最大时间间隔为30天

    *Pay接口

    *获取Pay交易历史记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
   "code": "000000",
   "message": "success",
   "data": [
   {
       "orderType": "C2C", *//交易类型枚举值：PAY（C端用户在商户侧消费）,PAY_REFUND（C端用户商户侧消费，退款）,C2C（C端用户间的转账）,CRYPTO_BOX（红包交易）,CRYPTO_BOX_RF（红包交易，退款）,C2C_HOLDING（C端用户转账给非币安用户）,C2C_HOLDING_RF（C端用户转账给非币安用户，退款）,PAYOUT（商户给其用户付款）
       "transactionId": "M_P_71505104267788288", *//流水编号
       "transactionTime": 1610090460133, *//交易时间戳
       "amount": "23.72469206", *//订单金额最多8位小数正为收入，负为支出
       "currency": "BNB", *//订单币种
       "fundsDetail": [ *//使用资金明细
               {
                "currency": "USDT", *//使用资金币种
                "amount": "1.2" *//使用资金金额为正最多8位小数
                },
                {
                 "currency": "ETH",
                 "amount": "0.0001"
                }
          ]
     }
   ],
  "success": true
}

    GET /sapi/v1/pay/transactions (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(UID): 3000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    startTimestamp LONG NO
    endTimestamp LONG NO
    limit INT NO *默认100,最大100
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *若startTimestamp和endTimestamp均未发送,只返回最近90天数据
    • *startTimestamp和endTimestamp的最大时间间隔为90天
    • *支持查询日期范围：近18个月以内的订单

    *闪兑接口

    *获取闪兑交易记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
   "list": [
        {
            "quoteId": "f3b91c525b2644c7bc1e1cd31b6e1aa6",
            "orderId": 940708407462087195,  *//订单号
            "orderStatus": "SUCCESS",  //訂單狀態
            "fromAsset": "USDT",       *//闪兑前币种
            "fromAmount": "20",        *//闪兑前金额
            "toAsset": "BNB",          *//闪兑后币种
            "toAmount": "0.06154036",  *//闪兑后金额
            "ratio": "0.00307702",     //價格
            "inverseRatio": "324.99",  *//反向价格
            "createTime": 1624248872184
        }
   ],
    "startTime": 1623824139000,
    "endTime": 1626416139000,
    "limit": 100,
    "moreData": false
}

    GET /sapi/v1/convert/tradeFlow (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(UID): 3000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    startTime LONG YES
    endTime LONG YES
    limit INT NO *默认100,最大1000
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *startTime和endTime的最大时间间隔为30天

    *返佣接口

    *获取现货返佣历史记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
   "status": "OK",
   "type": "GENERAL",
   "code": "000000000",
   "data": {
        "page": 1,  *//当前页
        "totalRecords": 2,  *//总记录数
        "totalPageNum": 1,  *//总页数
        "data": [
            {
                "asset": "USDT",  *//返佣资产
                "type": 1,        *//返佣类型：1为推荐人返佣，2为被推荐人返现
                "amount": "0.0001126",  *//金额
                "updateTime": 1637651320000
            },
            {
                "asset": "ETH",
                "type": 1,
                "amount": "0.00000056",
                "updateTime": 1637928379000
            }
        ]
    }

}

    GET /sapi/v1/rebate/taxQuery (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(UID): 3000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    page INT NO 默認1
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *startTime和endTime的最大时间间隔为30天
    • *若startTime和endTime均未发送,只返回最近7天数据
    • *查询时间最早支持于2020年6月10号

    *NFT接口

    *获取NFT资金流水记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "total": 2,  *//交易记录总数
  "list": [
    {
      "orderNo": "1_470502070600699904", *//数字前缀含义0:买单，1:卖单，2:版税收入，3:一级市场买单，4:mint费用
      "tokens": [
        {
          "network": "BSC",  *//NFT的网络
          "tokenId": "216000000496",  *//NFT的TokenID
          "contractAddress": "MYSTERY_BOX0000087"  *//NFT的ContractAddress
        }
      ],
      "tradeTime": 1626941236000,     *//交易成功时间
      "tradeAmount": "19.60000000",  *//交易金额（实际收入/实际购买总价/实际费用)
      "tradeCurrency": "BNB"。               *//交易币种
    },
    {
      "orderNo": "1_488306442479116288",
      "tokens": [
        {
          "network": "BSC",
          "tokenId": "132900000007",
          "contractAddress": "0xAf12111a592e408DAbC740849fcd5e68629D9fb6"
        }
      ],
      "tradeTime": 1631186130000,
      "tradeAmount": "192.00000000",
      "tradeCurrency": "BNB"
    }
  ]
}

    GET /sapi/v1/nft/history/transactions (HMAC SHA256)

    權重(UID): 3000

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    orderType INT YES *0:买单，1:卖单，2:版税收入，3:一级市场买单，4:mint费用
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit INT NO *默认50,最大50
    page INT NO 默認1
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *startTime和endTime的最大时间间隔为90天
    • *若startTime和endTime均未发送,只返回最近7天数据

    *获取NFT充值记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "total": 2,
  "list": [
    {
      "network": "ETH",  *//NFT的网络
      "txID": null,      *//该笔充值记录的TransactionID
      "contractAdrress": "0xe507c961ee127d4439977a61af39c34eafee0dc6",  *//NFT的ContractAddress
      "tokenId": "10014",   *//NFT的TokenID
      "timestamp": 1629986047000
    },
    {
      "network": "BSC",
      "txID": null,
      "contractAdrress": "0x058451b463bab04f52c0799d55c4094f507acfa9",
      "tokenId": "10016",
      "timestamp": 1630083581000
    }
  ]
}

    參數:

    名稱 類型 是否必須 描述
    startTime LONG NO
    endTime LONG NO
    limit INT NO *默认50,最大50
    page INT NO 默認1
    recvWindow LONG NO
    timestamp LONG YES
    • *startTime和endTime的最大时间间隔为90天
    • *若startTime和endTime均未发送,只返回最近7天数据

    *获取NFT提现记录(USER_DATA)

    響應:

    {
  "total": 178,
  "list": [
    {
      "network": "ETH",
      "txID": "0x2be5eed31d787fdb4880bc631c8e76bdfb6150e137f5cf1732e0416ea206f57f",
      "contractAdrress": "0xe507c961ee127d4439977a61af39c34eafee0dc6",  *//NFT的ContractAddress
      "tokenId": "1000001247",    *//NFT的TokenID
      "timestamp": 1633674433000, *//提现时间
      "fee": 0.1,         //提現手續費
      "feeAsset": "ETH"   *//手续费币种
    },
    {
      "network": "ETH",
      "txID": "0x3b3aea5c0a4faccd6f306641e6deb9713ab229ac233be3be227f580311e4362a",
      "contractAdrress": "0xe507c961ee127d4439977a61af39c34eafee0dc6",
      "tokenId": "40000030",
      "timestamp": 1633677022000,
      "fee": 0.1,
      "feeAsset": "ETH"
